LogDescription: Find a Shrine Bauble in Lake Elune'ara, and take it to the Shrine of Remulos in northwestern Moonglade.  Once there, use the Shrine Bauble.$B$BYou must speak with Tajarri at the shrine afterwards in order to complete the trial.

LogDescription: Find the Half Pendant of Aquatic Agility and the Half Pendant of Aquatic Endurance.  Speak with the residents of Moonglade to learn clues as to where these items may be located.$B$BForm the Pendant of the Sea Lion from the two pendant halves.  You need to be in proximity of the Shrine of Remulos to do this.$B$BBring the joined pendant to Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

Once acquired, contact Talvash del Kissel remotely by using the Phial of Scrying he previously gave you.$B$BFrom the journal, you know...$B* The ruby has been stashed in a barricaded Shadowforge area.$B* The topaz has been hidden in an urn in one of the Trogg areas, near some Alliance dwarves.$B$B* The sapphire has been claimed by Grimlok, the trogg leader.

LogDescription: Find and slay the murloc known as Murkdeep.  The creature is thought to be defending the murloc huts south of Auberdine along the water.$B$BReport the death of Murkdeep to Sentinel Glynda Nal'Shea in Auberdine.

LogDescription: Find the three gemstones of command: The Gemstone of Smolderthorn, Gemstone of Spirestone, and Gemstone of Bloodaxe. Return them, along with the Unadorned Seal of Ascension, to Vaelan.$B$BThe Generals, as told to you by Vaelan, are: War Master Voone of the Smolderthorn; Highlord Omokk of the Spirestone; and Overlord Wyrmthalak  of the Bloodaxe.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vaelan in Blackrock Spire.

LogDescription: Travel to the Wyrmbog in Dustwallow Marsh. Find the ancient drake, Emberstrife and beat him without mercy until his will is broken.$B$BIt is at that moment which you must place the Unforged Seal of Ascension before the great beast. You must then be quick to use the Orb of Draconic Energy on his weakened form and claim dominion over his mental faculties. Control the beast and force the Flames of the Black Dragonflight upon the Unforged Seal of Ascension!
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vaelan in Blackrock Spire.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Chromie at Ruins of Andorhal in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay Warchief Rend Blackhand. Take his head and return to Orgrimmar.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

LogDescription: Wait for Menara Voidrender to complete the Orb of Noh'Orahil and then speak to her again.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Menara Voidrender in The Barrens.

LogDescription: Return the Cleansed Infernal Orb to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Travel to Blackrock Spire and find out what happened to Bijou.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Find Bijou's Belongings and return them to her. You recall her mentioning that she stashed them on the bottom floor of the city.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bijou in Alterac Mountains.

LogDescription: Take Bijou's Reconnaissance Report back to Grandmaster Lexlort in Kargath.$B
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Destroy 8 Diseased Wolves, and then return to Mulgris Deepriver at the Writhing Haunt, Western Plaguelands.$B$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mulgris Deepriver at Darrowmere Lake in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Destroy 8 Diseased Grizzlies, and then return to Mulgris Deepriver at the Writhing Haunt, Western Plaguelands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mulgris Deepriver at Darrowmere Lake in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Based on the magic enchanted within the Glyphed Oaken Branch, its delivery to the Cenarion Circle in Darnassus is the next step the tauren druid sought.  Seek one of the druids there for assistance.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Based on the magic enchanted within the Glyphed Oaken Branch, its delivery to the Cenarion Circle in Thunder Bluff is the next step the tauren druid sought.  Seek one of the druids there for assistance.

LogDescription: Find Bijou's Belongings and return them to her. Good luck!$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bijou in Alterac Mountains.

LogDescription: Travel to the Burning Steppes and give Bijou's Information to Marshal Maxwell.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: The ramblings of the ghostly woman indicated that she needed a package delivered.  She claimed that it was where her horse was.  As to where the horse is or where the package was to be delivered - the ghost remains incomprehensible.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Check with the Royal Factors of Stormwind to learn the whereabouts of an Emma Felstone.  There is usually a census officer located in City Hall.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Check with the Royal Overseers of the Undercity to learn the whereabouts of a Jeremiah Felstone.  There is usually a census officer located near guild and tabard registration.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Find and return Crossroads' Supply Crates to Thork in the Barrens.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thork in The Barrens.

Return to Mangletooth in Mulgore.

LogDescription: Talk to Malyfous Darkhammer in Everlook.

LogDescription: Find Ol' Emma in Stormwind and see if she is in fact Emma Felstone.  If she is, then perhaps she'd like the package Janice Felstone made for her.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Find Jeremiah Payson in the Undercity and see if he is in fact Jeremiah Felstone.  If he is, then perhaps he'd like the package Janice Felstone made for him.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Return to Janice Felstone in Western Plaguelands her Good Luck Half-Charm.

LogDescription: Locate the other half of the Good Luck Charm somewhere on the Felstone Farm in Western Plaguelands and reassemble it.$B$BGive the Good Luck Charm to Janice Felstone on the Felstone Farm, Western Plaguelands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Janice Felstone at Felstone Field in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Bring a Blood Shard to Mangletooth in Camp Taurajo in the Barrens.$B$BCollect more Blood Shards if you want him to bless you with Agamaggan's power.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mangletooth at Camp Taurajo in The Barrens.

LogDescription: Test quest to see if mail is sent to your mailbox. Just hit complete,then go check your mail.$B$BHave a nice day.
Storm Shadowhoof at Everlook in Winterspring wants you to kill Ursius.

LogDescription: Return to Darnassus and show Mathrengyl Bearwalker the Pendant of the Sea Lion.

LogDescription: Gather 10 bushels of Incendia Agave, and then consult Magatha Grimtotem on Elder Rise in Thunderbluff.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Magatha Grimtotem in Thunder Bluff.

LogDescription: In order to create the Cap of the Scarlet Savant, you will be required to bring the following items back to Malyfous Darkhammer: 1 Pristine Hide of the Beast; 5 Frayed Abomination Stitchings; 8 Arcane Crystals; 5 Enchanted Scarlet Thread. $B$BYou will also be required to pay 50 gold pieces for the crafting of the item.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Malyfous Darkhammer at Everlook in Winterspring.

LogDescription: Locate and retrieve the three Secret Notes in Darkcloud Pinnacle.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Cliffwatcher Longhorn at Freewind Post in Thousand Needles.

LogDescription: Bring the Third and Fourth Mosh'aru Tablets to Prospector Ironboot in Tanaris.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Prospector Ironboot at Steamwheedle Port in Tanaris.

LogTitle: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
LogDescription: Seek out Commander Ashlam Valorfist.  His base camp is located at Chillwind Camp, north of the Alterac Mountains.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: In order to create the Leggings of Arcana, you will be required to bring the following items back to Malyfous Darkhammer: 1 Pristine Hide of the Beast; 5 Frayed Abomination Stitchings; 5 Arcanite Bars; 5 Frostwhisper's Embalming Fluid.$B$BYou will also be required to pay 50 gold pieces for the crafting of the item.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Malyfous Darkhammer at Everlook in Winterspring.

LogDescription: In order to create the Breastplate of Bloodthirst, you will be required to bring the following items back to Malyfous Darkhammer: 1 Pristine Hide of the Beast; 10 Frayed Abomination Stitchings; 5 Arcanite Bars; 5 Skin of Shadow.$B$BYou will also be required to pay 50 gold pieces for the crafting of the item.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Malyfous Darkhammer at Everlook in Winterspring.

LogDescription: Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy War Master Voone, Highlord Omokk, and Overlord Wyrmthalak.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Marshal Maxwell at Morgan's Vigil in the Burning Steppes.

LogDescription: Donova Snowden in Winterspring wants you to kill 8 Winterfall Pathfinders, 8 Winterfall Den Watchers, and 8 Winterfall Totemics.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

LogDescription: Bring the Empty Firewater Flask to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

LogDescription: Search the Deadwood furbolg camp in northern Felwood for a clue.

LogDescription: Report back to Donova Snowden with your findings.

LogDescription: Proceed to the Scarlet Crusade's base camp between Felstone Field and Dalson's Tears and destroy their command tent.$B$BPlace the Scourge banner at the camp, and then return to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Executor Derrington at The Bulwark in Tirisfal Glades.

LogDescription: Using the Beacon Torch, mark each tower in Andorhal; you will need to stand in the doorway of the tower to successfully mark it.$B$BOnce all four towers are marked, return the Beacon Torch to Commander Ashlam Valorfist in Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Using the Beacon Torch, mark each tower in Andorhal; you will need to stand in the doorway of the tower to successfully mark it.$B$BOnce all four towers are marked, return the Beacon Torch to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

LogTitle: Lee's Ultimate Test Quest... of Doom!
LogDescription: Kill 6 sheep for Benny and then run like hell!$B$B$B$B$BJust kidding... about the running part.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Benny Questgiver.

LogDescription: Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay General Drakkisath.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Marshal Maxwell at Morgan's Vigil in the Burning Steppes.

LogDescription: Someone in this world must know what to do with these gauntlets. Good luck!
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Donova Snowden in Winterspring wants you to defeat High Chief Winterfall.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.
Return to Aurius.

LogDescription: Bring the Crudely-written Log to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Bring Malyfous Darkhammer 6 Enchanted Thorium Bars, 2 Essence of Fire, and 4 Star Rubies. You will also need to turn in your Unfired Plate Gauntlets.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Malyfous Darkhammer at Everlook in Winterspring.
\n

LogDescription: Speak with Lorax. Listen to what he has to say.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lorax at Darkwhisper Gorge in Winterspring.

LogDescription: Travel to Blackrock Spire and find Goraluk Anvilcrack. Slay him and then use the Blood Stained Pike upon his corpse. After his soul has been siphoned, the pike will be Soul Stained.$B$BYou must also find the Unforged Rune Covered Breastplate.$B$BReturn both the Soul Stained Pike and the Unforged Rune Covered Breastplate to Lorax in Winterspring.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lorax at Darkwhisper Gorge in Winterspring.

LogDescription: Take the Crudely-written Log to Kelek Skykeeper in southern Felwood.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Bring 2 Tough Scorpid Breastplates, 2 Tough Scorpid Gloves, and 10 Worn Dragonscales to Peter Galen in Azshara.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Dragonscale Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Elemental Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Peter Galen at Ruins of Eldarath in Azshara.

LogDescription: Find Pamela Redpath in Darrowshire.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Bring a Wild Leather Vest and a Wild Leather Helmet to Caryssia Moonhunter in Feralas.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Tribal Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Elemental Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Caryssia Moonhunter in Thousand Needles.

LogDescription: Bring 2 Heart of Fire, 2 Globe of Water, 2 Core of Earth, and 2 Breath of Wind to Sarah Tanner in Searing Gorge.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Elemental Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sarah Tanner at Tanner Camp in Searing Gorge.

LogDescription: Bring 2 Tough Scorpid Breastplates, 2 Tough Scorpid Gloves, and 10 Worn Dragonscales to Thorkaf Dragoneye in the Badlands.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Dragonscale Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Elemental Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thorkaf Dragoneye in Badlands.

LogDescription: Bring 2 Heart of Fire, 2 Globe of Water, 2 Core of Earth, and 2 Breath of Wind to Brumn Winterhoof in the Arathi Mountains.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Elemental Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Brumn Winterhoof at Boulder'gor in Arathi Highlands.

LogDescription: Slay Arnak Grimtotem and bring proof of your deed to Cliffwatcher Longhorn in Freewind Post.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Cliffwatcher Longhorn at Freewind Post in Thousand Needles.

LogDescription: Bring a Wild Leather Vest and a Wild Leather Helmet to Se'Jib in Stranglethorn Vale.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Tribal Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Elemental Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Se'Jib in Stranglethorn Vale.

LogDescription: Find Pamela's doll.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Pamela Redpath at Darrowshire in Eastern Plaguelands.
Return to Dadanga.

LogDescription: Slay the beast and bring back the Hypercapacitor Gizmo and Panther Cage Key to Wizlo Bearingshiner.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wizlo Bearingshiner at Whitereach Post in Thousand Needles.

LogDescription: Speak with Marlene, south of the Ruins of Andorhal.

LogDescription: Bring Joseph's Wedding Ring to Chromie.

LogDescription: Bring the Annals of Darrowshire to Chromie in Andorhal.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Chromie at Ruins of Andorhal in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Enter Jaedenar and slay 4 Jaedenar Hounds, 4 Jaedenar Guardsmen, 6 Jaedenar Adepts, and 6 Jaedenar Cultists before returning to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Greta Mosshoof at Emerald Sanctuary in Felwood.

LogDescription: Seek out and destroy 2 Entropic Beasts and 2 Entropic Horrors while exploring Shatter Scar Vale. After checking to see if the craters there are still filled with corrupt fel water, return to Taronn Redfeather in Felwood.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Taronn Redfeather at Emerald Sanctuary in Felwood.

LogDescription: Take the Empty Canteen to the Moon Well in the center of Jaedenar and fill it before returning to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Greta Mosshoof at Emerald Sanctuary in Felwood.

LogDescription: Take the Corrupt Moon Well Water to Islen Waterseer in the Barrens.

LogDescription: Take the Purified Moon Well Water to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Travel to Winterspring and find Haleh. Give her Awbee's scale.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak with Haleh if you wish to continue.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak with Jeziba in the Plaguelands. He resides in Andorhal.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Take Umi's Mechanical Yeti and scare her friends with it:$B$BLegacki in Everlook (Winterspring)$BSprinkle in Gadgetzan (Tanaris)$BQuixxil in Marshal's Refuge (Un'Goro Crater)$B$BWhen you are done, bring the Mechanical Yeti back to Umi.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Umi Rumplesnicker at Everlook in Winterspring.

LogDescription: Read from the Catalogue of the Wayward.$B
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Using the Purified Moon Well Water, douse the flames of the four braziers of protection within Shadow Hold in Felwood, then return to Greta Mosshoof in the Emerald Sanctuary.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Greta Mosshoof at Emerald Sanctuary in Felwood.

LogDescription: To forge the Breastplate of the Chromatic Flight, you will be required to bring the following items to Jeziba the 'Sculptor':$B$B1 Chromatic Carapace.$B$B10 Brilliant Chromatic Scales.$B$B10 Blood of Heroes.$B$B10 Frayed Abomination Stitchings.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Jeziba at Ruins of Andorhal in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: To forge the Legplates of the Chromatic Defier, you will be required to bring the following items to Jeziba the 'Sculptor':$B$B1 Chromatic Carapace.$B$B10 Brilliant Chromatic Scales.$B$B10 Blood of Heroes.$B$B5 Skin of Shadow.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Jeziba at Ruins of Andorhal in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Bring Davil's Libram and Redpath's Shield to Carlin Redpath.

LogDescription: Bring the Skull of Horgus and the Shattered Sword of Marduk to Carlin Redpath at Light's Hope Chapel.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Carlin Redpath at Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Rivern Frostwind wants you to slay 5 Winterfall Shaman and 5 Winterfall Ursa.

LogDescription: Search through Jaedenar to discover what the Blood Red Key is used for.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Escort Arko'narin to where Lightforge and her equipment are being held, and then protect her as you escape Shadow Hold. Afterwards, seek out Jessir Moonbow in Felwood to let her know what's happened to her friends.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Jessir Moonbow at Emerald Sanctuary in Felwood.

LogDescription: Return to Jaedenar and kill the succubus Rakaiah before finding the Remains of Trey Lightforge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to the remains of Trey Lightforge at Jaedenar in Felwood.

LogDescription: Bring 5 Resonating Skulls and the Mystic Crystal to Carlin Redpath in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Carlin Redpath at Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Bring the Extended Annals of Darrowshire to Carlin Redpath in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Free 15 Darrowshire Spirits and return to Carlin Redpath.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Carlin Redpath at Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Recover 10 Plagued Flesh Samples from Stratholme and return them to Betina Bigglezink. You suspect that any creature in Stratholme would have said flesh sample.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Betina Bigglezink at Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Travel to Stratholme and search the ziggurats. Find and return new Scourge Data to Betina Bigglezink.$B

LogDescription: Find Fras Siabi's smoke shop in Stratholme and recover a box of Siabi's Premium Tobacco. Return to Smokey LaRue when the job is done.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Smokey LaRue at Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Speak with High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

QuestCompletionLog: Unlock the Scourge Cauldron at Felstone Field in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Bring the Filled Felstone Field Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Travel to Stratholme, in the north. Search the supply crates that litter the city and recover 5 Stratholme Holy Water. Return to Leonid Barthalomew the Revered when you have collected enough of the blessed fluid.

LogDescription: Speak with Jaron Stoneshaper in Starfall Village.

LogDescription: Use Jaron's Pick to find the four Highborne Relic Fragments. Bring them to Aurora Skycaller in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Aurora Skycaller in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Find the Sacred Highborne Writings in the Temple of Zin-Malor in Azshara, and bring them to Aurora Skycaller near the Northpass Tower in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Bring an Enchanted Thorium Bar, 5 Crystal Restore, and a Vial of Dire Water to Aurora Skycaller near the Northpass Tower in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Find Starfall in Winterspring and speak with Wynd Nightchaser.

LogDescription: Travel to Stratholme and find Archivist Galford of the Scarlet Crusade. Destroy him and burn down the Scarlet Archive.

LogDescription: Speak with Wynd Nightchaser in Starfall Village, and ask about the proper place for the Crystal of Zin-Malor.

LogDescription: Speak with Eagan Peltskinner.

LogDescription: Take the Head of Balnazzar to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff in the Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Venture to Stratholme and destroy Baron Rivendare. Take his head and return to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff at Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Speak with Lord Maxwell Tyrosus. He is inside the church.

LogDescription: Open the Argent Hold and claim your reward.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Find Egan. You only know that he was last seen around Stratholme.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Use Egan's Blaster on the ghostly and spectral citizens of Stratholme. When the restless souls break free from their ghostly shells, use the blaster again - freedom will be theirs!$B$BFree 15 Restless Souls and return to Egan.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Egan at Plaguewood in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: To become an Armorsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Grumnus: 4 Ornate Mithril Helms, 2 Ornate Mithril Boots, 1 Ornate Mithril Breastplate.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Grumnus Steelshaper in Dun Morogh.

LogDescription: To become a Weaponsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Ironus: 4 Moonsteel Broadswords, 4 Massive Iron Axes, 2 Heavy Mithril Axes, and 2 Big Black Maces.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ironus Coldsteel at the Great Forge in Ironforge.

LogDescription: To become an armorsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Okothos: 4 Ornate Mithril Helms, 2 Ornate Mithril Boots, 1 Ornate Mithril Breastplate.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Okothos Ironrager in Orgrimmar.

LogDescription: To become a Weaponsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Borgosh: 4 Moonsteel Broadswords, 4 Massive Iron Axes, 2 Heavy Mithril Axes, and 2 Big Black Maces.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Borgosh Corebender in Orgrimmar.

LogDescription: Travel to Stratholme and kill the Crimson Hammersmith. Recover the Crimson Hammersmith's Apron and return to Lilith.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lilith the Lithe at Everlook in Winterspring.

LogDescription: Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay Shadow Hunter Vosh'gajin. Recover Vosh'gajin's Snakestone and return to Kilram.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Kilram at Everlook in Winterspring.

LogDescription: Find the Black Guard Swordsmith in Stratholme and destroy him. Recover the Insignia of the Black Guard and return to Seril Scourgebane.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Seril Scourgebane at Everlook in Winterspring.

LogDescription: Escort Kerlonian Evershade to Liladris Moonriver at Maestra's Post in Ashenvale.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Liladris Moonriver in Ashenvale.

LogDescription: Venture to the Scholomance and recover the Barov family fortune. Four deeds make up this fortune: The Deed to Caer Darrow; The Deed to Brill; The Deed to Tarren Mill; and The Deed to Southshore. Return to Alexi Barov when you have completed this task.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Alexi Barov at the Bulwark in Tirisfal Glades.

LogDescription: Travel to Chillwind Camp - Alliance territory - and assassinate Weldon Barov. Take his head and return to Alexi Barov.$B$BBe warned, Weldon will probably be well protected by Alliance scum.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Alexi Barov at the Bulwark in Tirisfal Glades.

LogDescription: Venture to the Scholomance and recover the Barov family fortune. Four deeds make up this fortune: The Deed to Caer Darrow; The Deed to Brill; The Deed to Tarren Mill; and The Deed to Southshore. Return to Weldon Barov when you have completed this task.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Weldon Barov at Chillwind Camp in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Travel to the Bulwark - Horde territory - and assassinate Alexi Barov. Take his head and return to Weldon Barov.$B$BBe warned, Alexi will probably be well protected by Horde filth.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Weldon Barov at Chillwind Camp in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Deliver Cliffwatcher Longhorn Report to Nataka Longhorn at Ghost Walker Post in Desolace.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Retrieve the Demon Box from Thunder Axe Fortress, and return it, along with the Demon Pick to Taiga Wisemane in Shadowprey Village.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Taiga Wisemane at Shadowprey Village in Desolace.

LogDescription: Find Doctor Theolen Krastinov inside the Scholomance. Destroy him, then burn the Remains of Eva Sarkhoff and the Remains of Lucien Sarkhoff. Return to Eva Sarkhoff when the task is complete.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Eva Sarkhoff at Darrowmere Lake in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Take the Bag of Horrors to Eva Sarkhoff on Caer Darrow.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Return to the Scholomance with the Blood of Innocents. Find the porch and place the Blood of Innocents in the brazier. Kirtonos will come to feast upon your soul.$B$BFight valiantly, do not give an inch! Destroy Kirtonos and return to Eva Sarkhoff.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Eva Sarkhoff at Darrowmere Lake in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Return the Remains of Trey Lightforge to Jessir Moonbow in Felwood.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Talk to Jinar'Zillen at Shadowprey Village, and then bring Nataka Longhorn 2 Bloodbelly fish.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Nataka Longhorn at Ghost Walker Post in Desolace.

LogDescription: Use the Foreman's Blackjack on Lazy Peons when they're sleeping.  Wake up 5 peons, then return the Foreman's Blackjack to Foreman Thazz'ril in the Valley of Trials.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Foreman Thazz'ril in Durotar.

LogDescription: Travel to the Arathi Highlands, to the ruins of Stromgarde. Search Stromgarde for a Keepsake of Remembrance. If you find such an item, return with it to Magistrate Marduke.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Magistrate Marduke at Darrowmere Lake in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Travel to Light's Hope in Eastern Plaguelands and seek out Leonid Barthalomew the Revered. Show him the Keepsake of Remembrance and tell him all that you have discovered.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Travel to Stratholme and find Menethil's Gift. Place the Keepsake of Remembrance upon the unholy ground.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Take the Soulbound Keepsake to Leonid Barthalomew in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Return to Magistrate Marduke in Caer Darrow. Show him the Soulbound Keepsake.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Find Ras Frostwhisper in the Scholomance. When you have found him, use the Soulbound Keepsake on his undead visage. Should you succeed in reverting him to a mortal, strike him down and recover the Human Head of Ras Frostwhisper. Take the head back to Magistrate Marduke.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Magistrate Marduke at Darrowmere Lake in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Collect 3 Gloom Weed and deliver them to Junior Apothecary Holland in the Brill graveyard.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Junior Apothecary Holland at Brill in Tirisfal Glades.

LogDescription: Collect 10 Doom Weed and deliver them back to Junior Apothecary Holland.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Junior Apothecary Holland at Brill in Tirisfal Glades.

LogDescription: Bring 10 Kodo Bones from the Kodo Graveyard to Bibbly F'utzbuckle at Kormek's Hut.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bibbly F'utzbuckle in Desolace.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Orphan Matron Battlewail in Orgrimmar.

LogDescription: Bring 25 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Find the Felvine in Dire Maul and acquire a shard from it.  Chances are you'll only be able to procure one with the demise of Alzzin the Wildshaper.  Use the Reliquary of Purity to securely seal the shard inside, and return it to Rabine Saturna in Nighthaven, Moonglade.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Rabine Saturna at Nighthaven in Moonglade.

LogDescription: Travel to Silithus and search for a Reliquary of Purity within the ruins of Southwind Village.  If you are able to find it, return with it to Rabine Saturna in Nighthaven, Moonglade.

LogDescription: Escort Taelan Fordring out of Hearthglen.

LogTitle: The Champion of the Banshee Queen
LogDescription: Speak with Nathanos Blightcaller in the Eastern Plaguelands. He is said to have taken up residence at the Marris Stead.$B
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Rivern Frostwind wants you to kill 4 Frostmaul Giants and 4 Frostmaul Preservers.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Rivern Frostwind at Frostsaber Rock in Winterspring.

LogDescription: Use the Cenarion Moondust on the Moonkin Stone of Auberdine to bring forth Lunaclaw.  From there, you must face Lunaclaw and earn the strength of body and heart it possesses.$B$BSpeak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker in Darnassus when you are done.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mathrengyl Bearwalker at Cenarion Enclave in Darnassus.

LogDescription: Use the Cenarion Lunardust on the Moonkin Stone between Mulgore and the Barrens to bring forth Lunaclaw.  From there, you must face Lunaclaw and earn the strength of body and heart it possesses.$B$BSpeak with Turak Runetotem in Thunder Bluff when you are done.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Turak Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

LogDescription: Kill 2 Scarlet Medics, 2 Scarlet Hunters, 2 Scarlet Magi and 2 Scarlet Knights before returning to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Bring Zaeldarr's Head to Caretaker Alen at Light's Hope Chapel.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Caretaker Alen at Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Travel to Corin's Crossing to the east and slaughter the Scourge that inhabit the town. Collect 7 pieces of Living Rot in under 10 minutes. Use the Mortar and Pestle to grind the Living Rot into Coagulated Rot.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Nathanos Blightcaller at Morris Stead in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Kill Huntsman Radley and Cavalier Durgen before returning to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Kill Infiltrator Hameya.  Use his key on the Mound of Dirt behind the Undercroft.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mound of Dirt in The Hinterlands.

LogDescription: Enter Hearthglen and find a high vantage point from which you can see the town and gauge the Scarlet Crusade's forces, then return to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Smokey LaRue wants you to get 2 Thorium Bars, 1 Golden Rod, 8 Hi-Explosive Bombs, and 8 Unstable Triggers.$B$BYou will have to find a blacksmith and an engineer for these items.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Smokey LaRue at Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Get the Book of the Ancients and return it to Azore Aldamort at the tower in Ethel Rethor.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Azore Aldamort at Ethel Rethor in Desolace.

LogTitle: When Smokey Sings, I Get Violent
LogDescription: Travel to Plaguewood, northwest of Light's Hope. Destroy 8 Scourge Structures by using Smokey's Special Compound at the Mark of Detonation planted inside each building. Smokey has had the Ziggurats and Slaughterhouses marked.$B$BOnce you plant the bomb, leave the building and marvel at your handiwork.$B$BBy the way, Smokey's Special Compound is rather... unstable.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Smokey LaRue at Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Use the Empty Cliffspring Falls Sampler to draw a sample of water from the mouth of the cave by the falls.$B$BDeliver the Filled Cliffspring Falls Sampler to Alanndarian Nightsong in Auberdine, Darkshore.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Alanndarian Nightsong at Auberdine in Darkshore.

LogDescription: Bring 5 Earthroot and 12 Lunar Funguses to Alanndarian Nightsong in Auberdine so she may make a curative salve.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Alanndarian Nightsong at Auberdine in Darkshore.

LogDescription: Use the Curative Animal Salve on 10 Sickly Deer that are located throughout Darkshore; doing so should cure them.  Sickly Deer have been reported starting south of the Cliffspring River to the north of Auberdine and extending all the way into southern Darkshore where the edge of Ashenvale begins.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Dendrite Starblaze at Nighthaven in Moonglade.

LogDescription: Return to Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave, Darnassus.

LogDescription: Travel to Moonglade and speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tonga Runetotem in The Barrens.

LogDescription: Bring 5 Earthroot and 5 Kodo Horns to Tonga Runetotem at the Crossroads so he may make a curative salve.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tonga Runetotem in The Barrens.

LogDescription: Use the Curative Animal Salve on 10 Sickly Gazelles that are located throughout the northern part of the Barrens; doing so should cure them.  Sickly Gazelles have been reported north of the east-west road that runs through the Crossroads.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Dendrite Starblaze at Nighthaven in Moonglade.

LogDescription: Return to Turak Runetotem on the Elder Rise, Thunder Bluff.

LogDescription: Grazle wants you to prove yourself by killing 5 Deadwood Warriors, 5 Deadwood Pathfinders, and 5 Deadwood Gardeners.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Grazle at Emerald Sanctuary in Felwood.

LogDescription: Escort Melizza Brimbuzzle, then speak with Hornizz Brimbuzzle at the Kodo Graveyard in Desolace.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hornizz Brimbuzzle in Desolace.

LogDescription: Travel to the northern borders of the Eastern Plaguelands and recover the Quel'Thalas Registry. The item is somewhere in the Quel'Lithien lodge.$B$BYou must also slay 8 Rangers, 8 Pathstriders, and 8 Woodsmen.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Nathanos Blightcaller at Morris Stead in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Bring 8 Ghost-o-plasms and the Crate of Ghost Magnets to Hornizz Brimbuzzle in Desolace.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogTitle: Duskwing, Oh How I Hate Thee...
LogDescription: Find Duskwing and slay him. From the corpse, recover a Patch of Duskwing's Fur and return it to Nathanos Blightcaller.$B$BIt is said that Duskwing roams the countryside to the north of Marris Stead.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Nathanos Blightcaller at Morris Stead in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Find Borelgore in the northern wastes of Eastern Plaguelands and destroy him. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller when the mission is complete.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Nathanos Blightcaller at Marris Stead in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Speak with Brother Anton at Nijel's Point in Desolace.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Find 10 pieces of Soft-shelled Clam Meat and bring it back to Mai'Lahii at Shadowprey Village.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mai'Lahii at Shadowprey Village in Desolace.

LogDescription: Slay 7 Slitherblade Myrmidon, 7 Slitherblade Naga, and 5 Slitherblade Sorceresses, and then talk to Drulzegar at Shadowprey in Desolace.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Drulzegar Skraghook at Shadowprey Village in Desolace.

LogDescription: Travel to the Undercity and speak with Bragor Bloodfist.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Return to Eastern Plaguelands and track down the Crimson Courier. Kill the Courier and recover the Grand Crusader's Command.$B$BTake the command to Nathanos Blightcaller for further instruction.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Nathanos Blightcaller at Morris Stead in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Travel to Tyr's Hand, southeast of the Marris Stead. Once there, take a bite of the Rotten Apple. While under the guise of the Scarlet Crusade, deliver the Grand Crusader's Command to Crusader Lord Valdelmar.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Crusader Lord Valdelmar at Ruins of the Scarlet Enclave in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Return to Nathanos Blightcaller with the new information.$B
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: The Scarlet Crusade is on the move. Somewhere along the road from Tyr's Hand to Stratholme you will find the Oracle, Demetria, and her entourage. Hunt her down and slay her. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller should you succeed.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Nathanos Blightcaller at Morris Stead in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Find Rackmore's Silver Key.  Find Rackmore's Golden Key.  Find and open Rackmore's Chest.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Rackmore's Chest at Sar'theris Strand in Desolace.

LogDescription: Kill Overlord Ror and return his claw to Dreka'Sur at Bloodvenom Post in Felwood.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Dreka'Sur at Bloodvenom Post  in Felwood.

LogDescription: Travel to Stratholme and slay Ramstein the Gorger. Take his head as a souvenir for Nathanos.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Nathanos Blightcaller at Morris Stead in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Get Augustus' Receipt Book from the inn in Terrordale.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Augustus the Touched in Terrordale in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Bring Lewis' Note to Thor the gryphon master.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak with Mathias Shaw in Old Town Stormwind. He resides in the Barracks.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak with Mathias Shaw again if you wish to accept his task.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Travel to Chillwind Camp in the Western Plaguelands and meet up with your contact, Flint Shadowmore.$B
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Scour the Eastern Plaguelands for clues as to the "Blightcaller" and the missing SI:7 agents. If you find any SI:7 Insignias, return them to Flint Shadowmore at Chillwind Camp.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Flint Shadowmore at Chillwind Camp in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Return to Stormwind and inform King Varian Wrynn of the fate of Nathanos Marris.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Assemble an army and travel to the Eastern Plaguelands. Launch a full assault on Nathanos Blightcaller and any Horde filth that may attempt to protect him.$B$BKeep your wits about you, $N. The Horde will defend the ranger lord with their very lives.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to King Varian Wrynn in Elwynn Forest.

LogDescription: Salfa wants you to kill 6 Winterfall Totemics, 6 Winterfall Den Watchers, and 6 Winterfall Pathfinders.

LogDescription: Tell Tammra Windfield in Sun Rock Retreat the good news.$B

LogDescription: Follow Reginald Windsor through Stormwind. Protect him from harm!
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Explore deep into the cave at Boulderslide Ravine and bring back 10 Resonite Crystals for Mor'rogal at Sun Rock Retreat to investigate.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mor'rogal at Sunrock Retreat in Stonetalon Mountains.

LogDescription: Collect 16 Satyr Horns for Pixel in Splintertree Post.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Pixel at Splintertree Post in Ashenvale.

LogDescription: Bring 20 Wrathtail Heads to Marukai along the Zoram Strand.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Marukai at Zoram'gar Outpost in Ashenvale.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mitsuwa at Zoram'gar Outpost in Ashenvale.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mor'rogal at Sunrock Retreat in Stonetalon Mountains.

LogDescription: Escort Ruul, then speak with Yama Snowhoof in Splintertree Post.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Yama Snowhoof at Falfarren River in Ashenvale.

LogDescription: You must search the world for a being capable of restoring the power to the Fragment of the Dragon's Eye. The only information you possess about such a being is that they exist.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: You must retrieve the Blood of the Black Dragon Champion from General Drakkisath. Drakkisath can be found in his throne room behind the Halls of Ascension in Blackrock Spire.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Haleh at The Ruins of Kel'Theril in Winterspring.

LogDescription: Kill 9 Ashenvale Outrunners, then return to Kuray'bin at Splintertree Outpost.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Kuray'bin at Splintertree Outpost in Ashenvale.

LogDescription: Find the 12 missing pages of the Shredder Operating Manual, and put them together to form Chapters 1, 2, and 3. Return the pages to Gurda Ragescar near Splintertree Post.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Gurda Ragescar at Splintertree Post in Ashenvale.

LogDescription: Bring Ambassador Malcin's Head to Bragor Bloodfist in the Undercity.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bragor Bloodfist at the Royal Quarter in the Undercity.

LogDescription: Take the Small Scroll to Bragor Bloodfist at the Royal Quarter in the Undercity.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Makaba Flathoof at Greatwood Vale in Stonetalon Mountains.

LogDescription: Report to Kadrak at the watch tower in northern Barrens.

LogDescription: Report to Kadrak at the watch tower in northern Barrens.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Open the Bundle of Reports.  Take the Warsong Reports to the Warsong Scout, Warsong Runner, and Warsong Outrider. Bring back the updates they give you to Kadrak at the northern watch tower in the barrens.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Kadrak at The Mor'shan Rampart in The Barrens.

LogDescription: Escort Torek on his attack against Silverwing Outpost and Duriel Moonfire, then report to Ertog Ragetusk at Splintertree Post.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ertog Ragetusk at Falfarren River in Ashenvale.
Return to Warsong Runner in Felwood.
Return to Warsong Outrider in Azshara.
Return to Warsong Scout in Ashenvale.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Makaba Flathoof at the border of the Barrens and Stonetalon Mountains.

LogDescription: Bring the head of Twilight Lord Kelris to Bashana Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bashana Runetotem at The Golden Plains in Mulgore.

LogDescription: Speak to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

LogDescription: Bring 20 Sapphires of Aku'Mai to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost in Ashenvale.

LogDescription: Bring the Damp Note to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost in Ashenvale.

LogDescription: Kill Lorgus Jett in Blackfathom Deeps and then return to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost in Ashenvale.

LogDescription: Listen to Thrall.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

LogDescription: Seek out Rokaro at Shadowprey Village in Desolace.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Deliver Rokaro's Letter to Myranda the Hag in the Western Plaguelands.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Travel to Blackrock Spire and collect 20 Black Dragonspawn Eyes. Return to Myranda the Hag when the task is complete.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Myranda the Hag at Sorrow Hill in Western Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Travel to the Wyrmbog in Dustwallow Marsh and seek out Emberstrife's Den. Once inside, wear the Amulet of Draconic Subversion and speak with Emberstrife.$B

LogDescription: It would appear as if the charade is over. You know that the Amulet of Draconic Subversion that Myranda the Hag created for you will not function inside Blackrock Spire. LogDescription: You think Lumak is trying to tell you that he can no longer help you improve your fishing skill. You may want to try to find his friend, Nat Pagle, a human fishing off one of the islands south of Theramore (at least that's what you think Lumak said).

LogDescription: Travel to Kalimdor, to the coastal city of Theramore. From there you must search for an island, south of the main town. Nat Pagle awaits your arrival!

LogDescription: Dirge Quikcleave wants you to get the following items:$B$B10 Giant Eggs. You will find those on the Rocs wandering Tanaris or any other species of large bird.$B$B10 pieces of Zesty Clam Meat. You can find those in clams, naturally!$B$B20 pieces of Alterac Swiss. Get thee to a cheesery!$B$BGather all of the items and return to Dirge.

LogDescription: Save patients by using Triage Bandages to tend to their wounds. You must save 15 patients before 6 of them die from their injuries.$B$BRemember the order of triage! Critically Injured Soldiers die the fastest followed by Badly Injured Soldiers. Injured Soldiers take the longest to die and should be saved AFTER your Critically Injured and Badly Injured Soldiers have been triaged.

LogDescription: You must destroy the guardians surrounding the 5 Pylons that power the Prison of Immol'thar. Once the Pylons have powered down, the force field surrounding Immol'thar will have dissipated.$B$BEnter the Prison of Immol'thar and eradicate the foul demon that stands at its heart. Finally, confront Prince Tortheldrin in Athenaeum.$B$BReturn to the Shen'dralar Ancient in the courtyard should you complete this quest.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Shen'dralar Ancient at Dalaran Crater in Alterac Mountains.

LogDescription: Return to the Athenaeum and find the Treasure of the Shen'dralar. Claim your reward!
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Travel to the Warpwood Quarter of Dire Maul and slay the water elemental, Hydrospawn. Return to Lorekeeper Lydros in the Athenaeum with the Hydrospawn Essence.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lorekeeper Lydros at Dalaran Crater in Alterac Mountains.

LogDescription: Search Dire Maul for Kariel Winthalus. Report back to Sage Korolusk at Camp Mojache with whatever information that you may find.

LogDescription: Search Dire Maul for Kariel Winthalus. Report back to Scholar Runethorn at Feathermoon with whatever information that you may find.

LogDescription: You must get Onyxia to breathe fire on the Unfired Ancient Blade. Once this is done, pick up the now Heated Ancient Blade. Be warned, a Heated Ancient Blade will not remain heated forever - time is of the essence.$B$BThe last step before returning to me is to slay the beast and drive the Heated Ancient Blade into her corpse.$B$BDo this and Quel'Serrar will be yours.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lorekeeper Lydros at Dalaran Crater in Alterac Mountains.

LogDescription: To free Thunderaan the Windseeker from his prison, you must present the right and left halves of the Bindings of the Wind Seeker, 10 bars of Elementium, and the Essence of the Firelord to Highlord Demitrian.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Highlord Demitrian in Silithus.

LogDescription: Examine the Vessel of Rebirth and return it to Highlord Demitrian.

Speak with Mor'zul Bloodbringer at the Altar of Storms in the Burning Steppes.

LogDescription: Bring 30 bottles of Raging Beast's Blood to Mor'zul Bloodbringer in the Burning Steppes.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mor'zul Bloodbringer at the Altar of Storms in the Burning Steppes.

LogDescription: Bring the Case of Blood to Gorzeeki Wildeyes at the Altar of Storms in the Burning Steppes.

LogDescription: Travel to Dire Maul in Feralas and recover 15 Satyr Blood from the Wildspawn Satyr that inhabit the Warpwood Quarter. Return to Daio in the Tainted Scar when this is done.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Daio the Decrepit in Blasted Lands.

LogDescription: Travel to Darkwhisper Gorge in Winterspring and recover 5 Tears of the Hederine from the Hederine demons that occupy the gorge. Return to Daio in the Tainted Scar when you have completed this task.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Daio the Decrepit in Blasted Lands.

LogDescription: Venture forth into the Tainted Scar and locate a Doomguard Commander.$B$BUse the Glowing Crystal Prison on the Doomguard Commander. Be prepared for a ferocious onslaught of attacks, as the demon attempts to escape capture.$B$BShould you succeed, return the Imprisoned Doomguard to Daio in the Tainted Scar.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Daio the Decrepit in Blasted Lands.

LogDescription: Speak with Impsy in Felwood.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Impsy in Felwood has asked that you bring him three Flawless Fel Essences originating from three distinct locations.$B$BThe Legashi Satyrs of Azshara hold the Flawless Fel Essence of their region. The Jaedenar Legionnaires of Jaedenar hold the Flawless Fel Essence of their region. The Felguard Sentries of the Blasted Lands hold the Flawless Fel Essence of their region.$B$BRecover the Flawless Fel Essences and return  to Impsy in Felwood.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Impsy at Shatter Scar Vale in Felwood.

LogDescription: Search Shatter Scar Vale in Felwood for the remains of Kroshius. When you locate the remains, use the Fel Fire near them and await Kroshius' return. When the infernal has awoken, slay him and take from his corpse Kroshius' Infernal Core.$B$BReturn Kroshius' Infernal Core to Niby the Almighty in Felwood.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Niby the Almighty at Shatter Scar Vale in Felwood.

LogDescription: Turn the Thorium Brotherhood Contract in to Lokhtos Darkbargainer if you would like to receive the plans for Sulfuron.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogTitle: The Balance of Light and Shadow
LogDescription: Save 50 Peasants before 15 are slain. Speak with Eris Havenfire should you accomplish this task.$B$BYou may view the Death Post to view how many Peasants have been slain.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Eris Havenfire in Eastern Plaguelands.

LogDescription: Purchase Shadowy Potions from Gorzeeki Wildeyes at the Altar of Storms in the Burning Steppes.$B$BUse the potions to travel through Jaedenar in Felwood, and speak with Lord Banehollow inside the Shadow Hold.

LogDescription: Confront Ulathek, then bring The Traitor's Heart to Lord Banehollow in Jaedenar.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lord Banehollow inside the Shadow Hold at Jaedenar in Felwood.

LogDescription: Purchase Xorothian Stardust from Ur'dan inside the Shadow Hold at Jaedenar in Felwood.  Bring it to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

LogDescription: Find the owner of the Ancient Petrified Leaf. Good luck, $N; It's a big world.

LogDescription: Hastat the Ancient has asked that you bring him a Mature Blue Dragon Sinew. Should you find this sinew, return it to Hastat in Felwood.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hastat the Ancient at Irontree Woods in Felwood.

LogDescription: Stoma the Ancient has asked that you bring him a Mature Black Dragon Sinew. Should you find this sinew, return it to Stoma in Felwood.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Stoma the Ancient at Irontree Woods in Felwood.

LogDescription: You must find and destroy these four demonic corrupters:$B$BSimone the Seductress.$B$BKlinfran the Crazed.$B$BSolenor the Slayer.$B$BArtorius the Doombringer.$B$BDestroy these creatures and return to Vartrus the Ancient in Felwood with their heads.$B$BRefer to the Petrified Bark in your inventory for clues as to their whereabouts.$B$BYou MUST complete this task by yourself.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vartrus the Ancient at Irontree Woods in Felwood.

LogDescription: Travel to Ironforge and get High Priest Rohan's Exorcism Censer.  You will need to make a donation of 150 gold in order to secure it.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak with Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in Stormwind's Cathedral District.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Return the Exorcism Censer to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Use the Exorcism Censer to drive out the spirits that torment Terrordale.  When you have slain 25 Terrordale Spirits, return to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in Stormwind City.

LogDescription: Speak with Grimand Elmore in Stormwind's Dwarven District.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Bring 40 Runecloth, 6 Arcanite Bars, 10 Arthas' Tears, 5 Stratholme Holy Water vials, and 150 gold to Grimand Elmore in the Dwarven District of Stormwind.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Grimand Elmore in Elwynn Forest.

LogDescription: Acquire special horse feed used for feeding a spirit horse.  Merideth Carlson in Southshore apparently is the source for such food.$B$BTravel to the Dire Maul dungeon in Feralas and slay Tendris Warpwood.  Doing so will free the Ancient Equine Spirit.  Feed it the special horse feed, thereby soothing the spirit.  Finally, give it the Arcanite Barding so it may bless it.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Return with the Blessed Arcanite Barding to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Retrieve 20 Enriched Manna Biscuits - the key ingredient in making Manna-Enriched Horse Feed - for Merideth Carlson at Southshore in the Hillsbrad Foothills.  The Argent Dawn is known as the sole purveyor of the biscuits.$B$BYou also need to give her 50 gold to soothe her ruffled sensibilities.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Merideth Carlson at Southshore in Hillsbrad Foothills.

LogDescription: Bring an Azerothian Diamond and a Pristine Black Diamond to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in Stormwind City.

LogDescription: Use the Divination Scryer in the heart of the Great Ossuary's basement in the Scholomance.  Doing so will bring forth the spirits you must judge.  Defeating these spirits will summon forth Death Knight Darkreaver.  Defeat him and reclaim the lost soul of the fallen charger.$B$BGive the Charger's Redeemed Soul and the Blessed Enchanted Barding to Darkreaver's Fallen Charger.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Darkreaver's Fallen Charger.

LogDescription: Take the Arcanite Barding to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in Stormwind's Cathedral District for his inspection.

LogDescription: Deep within the Slag Pit of the Cauldron, in the Searing Gorge, you will find the traitorous Dark Iron dwarf named Overseer Maltorius.$B$BSlay Overseer Maltorius and take his head. Return the head to Lookout Captain Lolo Longstriker in the Searing Gorge for your reward.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lookout Captain Lolo Longstriker at Thorium Point in Searing Gorge.

LogDescription: Deep within the Slag Pit of the Cauldron, you will find the sleeping quarters of the Dark Iron dwarves.$B$BTravel to the sleeping quarters and steal 20 Dark Iron Pillows. Return to Evonice Sootsmoker in the Searing Gorge when you have accomplished this task.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Evonice Sootsmoker at The Cauldron in Searing Gorge.

LogDescription: Find the Gauntlet of Gordok Might and return it to Captain Kromcrush in Dire Maul.$B$BAccording to Kromcrush, the "old timey story" says that Tortheldrin - a "creepy" elf who called himself a prince - stole it from one of the Gordok kings.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Captain Kromcrush at Fenris Isle in Silverpine Forest.

LogTitle: Look at the Size of It!
LogDescription: Take Chambermaid Pillaclencher's Pillow to Evonice Sootsmoker in the Searing Gorge.
Collect 10 Water Elemental Cores from the Sea Elementals and Sea Sprays along the Forgotten Coast of Feralas, and bring them back to Zorbin Fandazzle who is near the dock there.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Zorbin Fandazzle at The Forgotten Coast in Feralas.

LogDescription: Somewhere in the Slag Pit of the Cauldron you will find the Secret Plans: Fiery Flux that Overseer Maltorius stole. Find those plans and return them to Master Smith Burninate in the Searing Gorge.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Master Smith Burninate at Thorium Point in Searing Gorge.

LogDescription: Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Heavy War Golems.$B$BThe Heavy War Golems wander the areas surrounding the Cauldron in the Searing Gorge. When you've killed enough, return to Hansel in Searing Gorge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hansel Heavyhands at Thorium Point in Searing Gorge.

LogDescription: Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Greater Lava Spiders in the Searing Gorge. You can find Greater Lava Spiders in the plateaus and lava pools of the Searing Gorge.$B$BReturn to Hansel Heavyhands in the Searing Gorge when you have killed enough Greater Lava Spiders.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hansel Heavyhands at Thorium Point in Searing Gorge.

LogDescription: Use Zorbin's Ultra-Shrinker to zap any kind of giant found in Feralas into a more manageable form.  Bring 10 Miniaturization Residues found on the zapped versions of these giants to Zorbin Fandazzle at the docks of the Forgotten Coast, Feralas.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Zorbin Fandazzle at The Forgotten Coast in Feralas.

LogDescription: Collect 6 Water Elemental Cores from the Sea Elementals and Sea Sprays along the Forgotten Coast of Feralas, and bring them back to Zorbin Fandazzle who is near the dock there.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Zorbin Fandazzle at The Forgotten Coast in Feralas.

LogTitle: Incendosaurs? Whateverosaur is More Like It
LogDescription: Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Incendosaurs.$B$BYou will find Incendosaurs occupying the lava pools inside the Slag Pit. The Slag Pit can be found in the Cauldron of the Searing Gorge.$B$BReturn to Hansel Heavyhands in the Searing Gorge when you have killed enough Incendosaurs.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hansel Heavyhands at Thorium Point in Searing Gorge.

LogTitle: STOLEN: Smithing Tuyere and Lookout's Spyglass
LogDescription: Find and return the Smithing Tuyere and Lookout's Spyglass to Taskmaster Scrange in the Searing Gorge.$B$BThe only information you have about these items is the following: They were definitely stolen by Dark Iron dwarves. The Smithing Tuyere is a blacksmithing tool used by blacksmiths and the Lookout's Spyglass is an invaluable monitoring tool to lookouts.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Taskmaster Scrange at Thorium Point in Searing Gorge.

LogDescription: Slay 15 Dark Iron Taskmasters and 15 Dark Iron Slavers. Return to Taskmaster Scrange in the Searing Gorge once you have accomplished this task.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Taskmaster Scrange at Thorium Point in Searing Gorge.

LogDescription: Bring 20 Zukk'ash Carapaces to Hadoken Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hadoken Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache in Feralas.

LogDescription: Defeat Stinglasher in the Writhing Deep, bringing its glands back to Hadoken Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

You should also check Skulk Rock.

LogDescription: Lard at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to find Lard's Lunch. Return to him when this task is complete.$B$BLard mentioned that he left it on the island to the north. Watch out for Vilebranch trolls.

Return to him when this task is complete.$B$BYou can find the Highvale high elves at the Quel'Danil Lodge in the northwestern region of the Hinterlands.

LogDescription: Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to bring him 1 Long Elegant Feather from the gryphons that inhabit the Hinterlands. Return to him once this task is complete.$B$BGryphons are known to inhabit every region of the Hinterlands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in The Hinterlands.

LogTitle: The Final Message to the Wildhammer
LogDescription: Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to travel to Aerie Peak in the western region of the Hinterlands and place the Final Message to the Wildhammer by the well in the center of town. Return to him once this task is complete.$B$BBeware of angry Wildhammer dwarves and unruly members of the Alliance.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in The Hinterlands.

LogDescription: Mystic Yayo'jin at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill 6 Vilebranch Scalpers and 2 Vilebranch Soothsayers. Return to her when this task is complete.$B$BYayo'jin indicated that these trolls could be found near the Shaol'watha and Agol'watha temples in the north by northeastern region of the Hinterlands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mystic Yayo'jin at Revantusk Village in The Hinterlands.

LogDescription: Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to rescue her mate, Elder Torntusk, from Jintha'alor.$B$BYou have been told that he is being held prisoner atop Jintha'alor, the Vilebranch capital city located in the southern region of the Hinterlands.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Elder Torntusk at Jintha'alor wants you to kill Hitah'ya the Keeper to get the Shackle Key to his bindings. Return to Elder Torntusk when you have recovered the key.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Elder Torntusk at Jintha'Alor in The Hinterlands.

LogDescription: Elder Torntusk at Jintha'alor wants you to return to Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village with news of his rescue.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Venture to the Molten Core entry portal in Blackrock Depths and recover a Core Fragment. Return to Lothos Riftwaker in Blackrock Mountain when you have recovered the Core Fragment.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lothos Riftwaker at Blackrock Mountain in Burning Steppes.

LogDescription: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to recover his twin brother's remains. Find and return Huntsman Malkhor's Skull and Huntsman Malkhor's Bones to Huntsman Markhor.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that his brother's remains were fed to the oozes and wolves of the Vilebranch. He also mentioned that there is a refuse pit filled with oozes in Jintha'alor as well as a wolf den. Both of these places are near the top of the temple.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in The Hinterlands.

LogDescription: Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to recover 5 Vessels of Tainted Blood from Jintha'alor. Return to Primal Torntusk when this task is complete.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in The Hinterlands.

LogTitle: Wanted: Vile Priestess Hexx and Her Minions
LogDescription: You have been ordered to slay Vile Priestess Hexx and 5 Vilebranch Aman'zasi Guards. See Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands once this task is complete.$B$BVile Priestess Hexx and the Aman'zasi Guards can be found atop Jintha'alor in the Hinterlands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in The Hinterlands.

LogTitle: Job Opening: Guard Captain of Revantusk Village
LogDescription: You have been tasked with the decimation of 5 Vilebranch Berserkers, 3 Vilebranch Shadow Hunters, 3 Vilebranch Blood Drinkers, and 2 Vilebranch Soul Eaters.$B$BShould you complete this task, return to Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in The Hinterlands.

LogDescription: Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to find his beloved Natalia. The information that you gathered points to Hive'Regal in the south as being the area in which you may find Mistress Natalia Mar'alith.$B$BDo not forget to visit the dwarves at Bronzebeard's camp before venturing into the hive. They might have some additional work and advice for you.$B$BAnd $N, remember the Commander's words: "Do what you must..."
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.

LogDescription: Rutgar Glyphshaper at Bronzebeard's Encampment in Silithus wants you to venture to Hive'Ashi, Hive'Zora, and Hive'Regal and recover Glyphed Rubbings from the Glyphed Crystals of each hive.$B$BUse the Geologist's Transcription Kit to make a reasonable facsimile of the ancient glyphs. Return to Rutgar Glyphshaper when you complete this task.

LogDescription: Frankal Stonebridge at Bronzebeard's Encampment in Silithus wants you to recover a Hive'Zora Silithid Brain, Hive'Ashi Silithid Brain, and a Hive'Regal Silithid Brain. Return to Frankal when you have completed this task.

Should the Qiraji Emissary appear, slay it and recover the Crystal Unlocking Mechanism. Return to Geologist Larksbane if you succeed.$B$BAssemble an army for this task, $N!

LogTitle: The Good News and The Bad News
LogDescription: Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris wants you to bring him 20 Arcanite Bars, 10 Elementium Ore, 10 Azerothian Diamonds, and 10 Blue Sapphires.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.

LogDescription: Use the Arcanite Buoy at the Swirling Maelstrom at the Bay of Storms in Azshara.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Anachronos at Caverns of Time in Tanaris.

LogDescription: Slay Nefarian and recover the Red Scepter Shard. Return the Red Scepter Shard to Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris. You have 5 hours to complete this task.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Anachronos at Caverns of Time in Tanaris.

LogDescription: Report to Krug Skullsplit at the Orgrimmar Legion post in front of Hive'Regal.  Prepare your Unsigned Field Duty Papers, obtain Signed Field Duty Papers and bring them to Windcaller Kaldon in Cenarion Hold.$B$BNote: Healing or casting beneficial spells on a member of the Orgrimmar Legion will flag you for PvP.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Windcaller Kaldon at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.
Return to Krug Skullsplit in Silithus.

LogDescription: Travel to the continent of Teldrassil and find Malfurion's agent somewhere outside the walls of Darnassus.$B
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Travel to the Moonglade and speak to Keeper Remulos.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Travel to the four Emerald Dream portals in Azeroth and collect a Fragment of the Nightmare's Corruption from each. Return to Keeper Remulos in the Moonglade when you have completed this task.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Keeper Remulos at Lake Elune'ara in Moonglade.

LogDescription: Defend Nighthaven from Eranikus. Do not let Keeper Remulos perish. Do not slay Eranikus. Defend yourself. Await Tyrande.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Keeper Remulos at the Shrine of Remulos in Moonglade.

LogDescription: Summon and slay an Azure Templar and report back to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing I in order to complete this quest.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bor Wildmane at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.

LogDescription: Contact Cenarion Scout Landion inside Hive'Regal and return the Hive'Regal Scout Report to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing VII in order to complete this quest.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.

LogDescription: Contact Cenarion Scout Jalia inside Hive'Ashi and return the Hive'Ashi Scout Report to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing VIII in order to complete this quest.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.

LogDescription: Slay Twilight Marauder Morna and 2 Twilight Marauders.  Report to Windcaller Proudhorn when your task is finished.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing IX in order to complete this quest.

LogDescription: Take the Green Scepter Shard to Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris.$B

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Kaymard Copperpinch in Orgrimmar.

LogDescription: Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon Lord Valthalak. Dispatch him, and use Lord Valthalak's Amulet on the corpse. Then, return Lord Valthalak's Amulet to the Spirit of Lord Valthalak.

LogDescription: Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain and give him the Brazier of Beckoning.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bodley in Burning Steppes.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at the Laughing Skull Ruins in Nagrand.

LogDescription: Investigate the Strange Object next to the Broken Corpse to determine what might have befallen the Cenarion Thicket.  Then return to Earthbinder Tavgren just outside the thicket in Terokkar Forest.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Earthbinder Tavgren just outside of the Cenarion Thicket in Terokkar Forest.

LogDescription: Defeat Skra'gath. Should you win, speak with Wodin the Troll-Servant to collect your reward.

LogDescription: Deliver the Surveying Equipment to the Image of Nexus-Prince Haramad at the Stormspire in the Netherstorm.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Use the Triangulation Device to point your way toward the first triangulation point.  Once you have found it, report the location to Dealer Hazzin at the Protectorate Watchpost on the Manaforge Ultris island in the Netherstorm.
QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Dealer Hazzin at the Protectorate Watchpost in Netherstorm.

LogDescription: Retrieve the Teleporter Power Pack and bring it to the Ethereal Teleport Pad on the Celestial Ridge to the east of Manaforge Ultris. Activate the pad and give the Teleporter Power Pack to the Image of Wind Trader Marid so he can install it.
QuestCompletionLog: Speak with the Image of Wind Trader Marid by using the Ethereal Teleport Pad at the Celestial Ridge in Netherstorm.

LogDescription: Gather 8 Nether Dragon Essence, then return to the Ethereal Teleport Pad area. Nether Dragon Essence may be obtained from Nether Drakes or Nether Dragons.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to the Ethereal Teleport Pad area at the Celestial Ridge in Netherstorm. Talk to a Shrouded Figure who is lurking nearby.

LogDescription: Gather 15 Nether Dragonkin Eggs, then return to Tyri and Jorad on the Celestial Ridge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tyri at the Celestial Ridge in Netherstorm.

LogDescription: Speak with Wind Trader Marid and lure him away from his trading post. Deal with him and then return to Tyri and Jorad on the Celestial Ridge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tyri at the Celestial Ridge in Netherstorm.

LogDescription: Use the Challenge of the Blue Flight to provoke Veraku on the southern edge of the Celestial Ridge. Defeat him and return to Tyri and Jorad on the Celestial Ridge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tyri at the Celestial Ridge in Netherstorm.

LogDescription: Use the Triangulation Device to point your way toward the second triangulation point.  Once you have found it, report the location to Wind Trader Tuluman at Tuluman's Landing, just on the other side of the bridge from the Manaforge Ara island in the Netherstorm.
QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Wind Trader Tuluman at Tuluman's Landing in Netherstorm.

LogDescription: Recover the Ata'mal Crystal and deliver it to the Image of Nexus-Prince Haramad at the Stormspire in the Netherstorm.

LogDescription: Andormu at the Caverns of Time has asked that you follow the Custodian of Time around the cavern.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Andormu at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris.
