QuestCompletionLog: Return to Garrosh Hellscream at Warsong Hold in Borean Tundra.

LogTitle: Hah... You're Not So Big Now!
LogDescription: Test out Crafty's Ultra-Advanced Proto-Typical Shortening Blaster on 5 Magmoth Crushers or Mates of Magmothregar. After you have done so, return to her at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Crafty Wobblesprocket at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Search the Spire of Blood for more information about the Vial of Fresh Blood.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Snow Tracker Grumm in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Waltor of Pal'ea at the Coast of Echoes in the Borean Tundra wants you to kill Kvaldir and recover 8 Tuskarr Relics.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Waltor of Pal'ea at the Coast of Echoes in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Waltor of Pal'ea at the Coast of Echoes in the Borean Tundra wants you to use the Tuskarr Torch to burn the Kvaldir ships at Pal'ea and Garrosh's Landing. You must destroy the following ships: The Serpent's Maw, The Kur Drakkar, Bor's Hammer and Bor's Anvil.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Waltor of Pal'ea at the Coast of Echoes in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Catch 4 torches in a row, then speak with the Master Fire Eater.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Master Fire Eater.

LogDescription: Collect 10 Warsong Outfits and a Warsong Banner. Bring them back to Crafty Wobblesprocket at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Crafty Wobblesprocket at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Destroy 5 Blood Globes and report to Snow Tracker Junek at Taunka'le Village.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Snow Tracker Junek at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Waltor of Pal'ea at the Coast of Echoes in the Borean Tundra wants you to bring him the Horn of the Ancient Mariner.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Waltor of Pal'ea at the Coast of Echoes in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Waltor of Pal'ea at the Coast of Echoes in the Borean Tundra wants you to use the Horn of the Ancient Mariner to summon Orabus the Helmsman. Once summoned, slay Orabus the Helmsman.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Waltor of Pal'ea at the Coast of Echoes in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Seek out Karuk at Riplash Strand.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Normantis has asked you to report to Librarian Donathan on Amber Ledge.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Follow Mootoo the Younger out of the mist. Speak to Elder Mootoo should you successfully save Mootoo the Younger.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Elder Mootoo at the Coast of Echoes in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Bring a Baby Crocolisk to Old Man Barlo.  You can find him fishing northeast of Shattrath City by Silmyr Lake.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Old Man Barlo at Silmyr Lake in Terokkar Forest.

LogDescription: Bring a Blackfin Darter to Old Man Barlo.  You can find him fishing northeast of Shattrath City by Silmyr Lake.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Old Man Barlo at Silmyr Lake in Terokkar Forest.

LogDescription: Catch the World's Largest Mudfish and bring it to Old Man Barlo.  You can find him fishing northeast of Shattrath City by Silmyr Lake.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Old Man Barlo at Silmyr Lake in Terokkar Forest.

LogDescription: Bring 10 Giant Freshwater Shrimp to Old Man Barlo.  You can find him fishing northeast of Shattrath City by Silmyr Lake.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Old Man Barlo at Silmyr Lake in Terokkar Forest.

LogDescription: Bring a Monstrous Felblood Snapper to Old Man Barlo.  You can find him fishing northeast of Shattrath City by Silmyr Lake.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Old Man Barlo at Silmyr Lake in Terokkar Forest.

LogDescription: While disguised as a Warsong orc, plant the Warsong Banner in the corpse of Magmothregar. Then, return with the disguise to Crafty Wobblesprocket at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Crafty Wobblesprocket at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Donathan on Amber Ledge has tasked you with using the Beryl Shield Detonator to bring down the shield at Beryl Point. You are then to defeat Salrand and collect the key she holds.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Librarian Donathan at Amber Ledge in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Meet with General Arlos inside the barracks in Valiance Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Escort Bonker Togglevolt to safety and then report in with Fizzcrank Fullthrottle at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Fizzcrank Fullthrottle at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Find Sage Highmesa near the Dens of Dying.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Destroy 10 Plagued Magnataur and then return to Sage Highmesa south of The Dens of Dying.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sage Highmesa in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Shadowstalker Canarius at Warsong Farms Outpost wants you to free 5 Scourge Prisoners.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Shadowstalker Canarius at Warsong Farms Outpost in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Sage Highmesa, standing just south of The Dens of Dying, has asked you to use Highmesa's Cleansing Seeds at a Den of Dying Plague Cauldron to neutralize it.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sage Highmesa in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Find Longrunner Bristlehorn at Talramas.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Donathan wants you to speak to Surristrasz on Amber Ledge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Surristrasz at Amber Ledge in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Give Salrand's Key to Warmage Anzim when you are ready to free Evanor.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Anzim on Amber Ledge wants you to fly with his war mages to free Lady Evanor at Beryl Point. You are then to report to her in the mage tower on Amber Ledge.
QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Lady Evanor at Amber Ledge in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Lady Evanor has sent you to speak with Surristrasz on Amber Ledge.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Destroy 20 Scourge of any type at Talramas and the Festering Pools. Then, return to Sage Highmesa just to the south of The Dens of the Dying.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sage Highmesa in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Greatfather Mahan at Taunka'le Village wants you to use the Map of the Geyser Fields to mark the locations of the South Sinkhole, the Northwest Sinkhole, and the Northeast Sinkhole.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Greatfather Mahan at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Bring 5 Elemental Hearts to Wind Tamer Barah at Taunka'le Village.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wind Tamer Barah at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Shadowstalker Ickoris at Warsong Farms Outpost wants you to scout Warsong Granary, Torp's Farm, and Warsong Slaughterhouse.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Shadowstalker Ickoris at Warsong Farms Outpost in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Destroy Doctor Razorgrin and Lich-Lord Chillwinter. Then, return to Sage Highmesa just to the south of The Dens of Dying.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sage Highmesa in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Farmer Torp at Warsong Farms Outpost wants you to kill 10 Unliving Swine.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Farmer Torp at Warsong Farms Outpost in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Speak with Greatmother Taiga at Taunka'le Village.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Farmer Torp at Warsong Farms Outpost wants you to rescue 8 Infected Kodo Beasts.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Farmer Torp at Warsong Farms Outpost in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Bring the Earthen Ring Magma Totem to the Ice Stone.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ice Stone at Darrow Hill in Hillsbrad Foothills.

LogDescription: Mordle Cogspinner has asked you to find Bixie Wrenchshanker to the south of The Dens of Dying.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Kill 10 Plagued Magnataur and then return to Bixie Wrenchshanker to the south of The Dens of Dying.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bixie Wrenchshanker in Borean Tundra.

LogTitle: There's Something Going On In Those Caves
LogDescription: Bixie Wrenchshanker, skulking just to the south of The Dens of Dying, has asked you to use Bixie's Inhibiting Powder at a Den of Dying Plague Cauldron to neutralize it.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bixie Wrenchshanker in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Reclaim the Lower Horn Half and Upper Horn Half from Chieftain Burblegoggle and Chieftain Gurgleboggle and bring them to Wind Tamer Barah at Taunka'le Village.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wind Tamer Barah at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Find Luma Skymother in the Slave Pens.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogTitle: Rats, Tinky Went into the Necropolis!
LogDescription: Find Tinky Wickwhistle inside Talramas.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogTitle: Might As Well Wipe Out the Scourge
LogDescription: Destroy 20 Scourge of any type at Talramas and the Festering Pools. Then, return to Bixie Wrenchshanker just to the south of The Dens of the Dying.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bixie Wrenchshanker in Borean Tundra.

LogTitle: I'm Stuck in this Damned Cage... But Not For Long!
LogDescription: Collect an Engine-Core Crystal, a Magical Gyroscope, and a Piloting Scourgestone. Deliver them to Tinky Wickwhistle at Talramas.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tinky Wickwhistle in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Speak with Bixie Wrenchshanker just south of The Dens of Dying.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak with Fizzcrank Fullthrottle at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak with King Mrgl-Mrgl at Winterfin Retreat.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Find Shadowstalker Getry at Warsong Farms.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak with King Mrgl-Mrgl at Winterfin Retreat.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Help Getry defeat Varidus the Flenser at Warsong Farms.$B$BReport to Garrosh Hellscream should you succeed.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Garrosh Hellscream at Warsong Hold in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Wind Tamer Barah at Taunka'le Village wants you to collapse the Nerubian sinkholes using the Horn of Elemental Fury and defeat Lord Kryxix.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wind Tamer Barah at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Speak with Fizzcrank Fullthrottle at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Listen to Fizzcrank Fullthrottle's tale and then find Jinky Wingnut at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Jinky Wingnut at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Speak to Warden Nork Bloodfrenzy at Warsong Hold in Borean Tundra.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogTitle: What's the Matter with the Transmatter?
LogDescription: Collect 15 Fizzcrank Spare Parts and deliver them to Mordle Cogspinner at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mordle Cogspinner at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogTitle: Coward Delivery... Under 30 Minutes or it's Free
LogDescription: Take the Alliance Deserter to the crossroads east of Warsong Hold and fire your Warsong Flare Gun to signal the Alliance.$B$BReport to Scout Tungok once you have successfully delivered the Alliance Deserter to their destination.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Scout Tungok at Bloodspore Plains in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Jinky Wingnut at Fizzcrank Airstrip has asked you to use the Re-Cursive Transmatter Injection on 6 Fizzcrank Mechagnomes.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Jinky Wingnut at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Abner Fizzletorque at Fizzcrank Airstrip wants you to use the Map of the Geyser Fields to mark the locations of the South Sinkhole, the Northwest Sinkhole, and the Northeast Sinkhole.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Abner Fizzletorque at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Scout Tungok at the Bloodspore Plains in the Borean Tundra wants you to kill 8 Bloodspore Harvesters, 5 Bloodspore Firestarters and 2 Bloodspore Roasters.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Scout Tungok at Bloodspore Plains in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Abner Fizzletorque at Fizzcrank Airstrip wants you to collect 8 Barrels of Oil using the Portable Oil Collector.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Abner Fizzletorque at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Bloodmage Laurith at the Bloodspore Plains in the Borean Tundra wants you to recover 10 Bloodspore Carpels.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bloodmage Laurith at Bloodspore Plains in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Bloodmage Laurith at the Bloodspore Plains in the Borean Tundra wants you to recover 5 Bloodspore Moth Pollen.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bloodmage Laurith at Bloodspore Plains in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Abner Fizzletorque at Fizzcrank Airstrip wants you to bring him 6 Thick Mammoth Hides.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Abner Fizzletorque at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Bloodmage Laurith at the Bloodspore Plains in the Borean Tundra has asked that you use the Pollinated Bloodspore Flower and allow her to observe the results.
QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Bloodmage Laurith at Bloodspore Plains in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Speak to Primal Mighthorn at the Bloodspore Plains in the Borean Tundra.$B
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Slay Gammothra and return the Head of Gammothra to Primal Mighthorn at the Bloodspore Plains in the Borean Tundra.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Primal Mighthorn at Bloodspore Plains in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Take the Head of Gammothra to Garrosh Hellscream in Warsong Hold.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Garrosh Hellscream at Warsong Hold in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Abner Fizzletorque at Fizzcrank Airstrip wants you to use the Shake-n-Quake 5000 to collapse the Nerubian tunnels and defeat Lord Kryxix.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Abner Fizzletorque at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Take the Massive Glowing Egg to Bloodmage Laurith at the Bloodspore Plains in the Borean Tundra.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bloodmage Laurith at Bloodspore Plains in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Locate Iggy "Tailspin" Cogtoggle in the Geyser Fields.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Iggy "Tailspin" Cogtoggle in the Scalding Pools wants you to gather 4 Gorloc Spice Pouches.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Iggy "Tailspin" Cogtoggle at Scalding Pools in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Report to Sergeant Hammerhill at Valiance Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Iggy "Tailspin" Cogtoggle in the Scalding Pools wants you to bring him 8 pieces of Microfilm.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Iggy "Tailspin" Cogtoggle at Scalding Pools in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Deliver the Ultrasonic Screwdriver to Crafty Wobblesprocket at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Crafty Wobblesprocket at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Use the Ultrasonic Screwdriver to reprogram 15 robots and then return to Crafty Wobblesprocket at Fizzcrank Airstrip.$B$BMake sure to loot the dead robot before you reprogram it.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Crafty Wobblesprocket at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Win the torch tossing game, then speak with the Master Fire Eater.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Master Fire Eater.
\n

LogDescription: Surristrasz wants you to travel to Coldarra. Once there, you are to speak with Archmage Berinand.

LogDescription: Dismantle Twonky, ED-210, Max Blasto, and The Grinder, and then report back to Jinky Wingnut at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Jinky Wingnut at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Medic Hawthorn, outside of Valiance Keep, wants you to go inside the Stormbreaker's hold and retrieve Hawthorn's Anti-Venom from a crate of First Aid Supplies.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Medic Hawthorn at the Sands of Nasam in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Speak to Captain "Lefty" Lugsail above the Stormbreaker in Valiance Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak to General Arlos inside the Inner Hold at Valiance Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Harbinger Vurenn wants you to fight the Cultist Necrolytes near Farshire to the north of Valiance Keep and retrieve the Cultist Communique from them.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Harbinger Vurenn at Valiance Keep in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Bring the Cultist Communique to Vindicator Yaala inside the inn in Valiance Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vindicator Yaala at Valiance Keep in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Vindicator Yaala wants you to use the Oculus of the Exorcist in three different locations in Valiance Keep to uncover and defeat Cult of the Damned members.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vindicator Yaala at Valiance Keep in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Recover 6 Fizzcrank Pilot Insignia from the bodies of Fizzcrank Recon Pilots and return them to Iggy "Tailspin" Cogtoggle in the Scalding Pools.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Iggy "Tailspin" Cogtoggle at Scalding Pools in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Iggy "Tailspin" Cogtoggle wants you to scuttle the Eastern Wreck, a Southern Wreck, and a Northwestern Wreck.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Iggy "Tailspin" Cogtoggle at Scalding Pools in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Sergeant Hammerhill wants you to kill 6 Crypt Crawlers in the Sands of Nasam outside of Valiance Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sergeant Hammerhill at Valiance Keep in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Research the Gearmaster's Manual and return Mechazod's Head to Fizzcrank Fullthrottle.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Fizzcrank Fullthrottle at Fizzcrank Airstrip in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Zaza at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in the Borean Tundra wants you to use the Pile of Fake Furs to trap 8 Nesingwary Trappers.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Zaza at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Arch Druid Lathorius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in the Borean Tundra has said that he will reward you should you bring him 15 Nesingwary Lackey Ears.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Arch Druid Lathorius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Arch Druid Lathorius at the D.E.H.T.A. Outpost in the Borean Tundra has said that he will reward you should you bring him 15 Nesingwary Lackey Ears.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Arch Druid Lathorius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Zaza at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in the Borean Tundra wants you to kill Karen the Culler.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Zaza at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Hierophant Cenius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in the Borean Tundra wants you to kill 10 Loot Crazed Divers.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hierophant Cenius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Seek out Hierophant Liandra at the Abandoned Reach.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Hierophant Liandra at the Abandoned Reach in the Borean Tundra wants you to recover 12 Shipments of Animal Parts.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hierophant Liandra at The Abandoned Reach in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Slay Clam Master K and return to Hierophant Cenius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hierophant Cenius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Make your way back to Fizzcrank Airstrip and speak with Fizzcrank Fullthrottle.
QuestCompletionLog: \n
\n

LogDescription: Bring 8 Nether Residue to Emissary Mordin in Shattrath City.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Emissary Mordin in Terokkar Forest.

LogTitle: Help Those That Cannot Help Themselves
LogDescription: Arch Druid Lathorius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in the Borean Tundra wants you to use the D.E.H.T.A. Trap Smasher to free 8 Mammoth Calves.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Arch Druid Lathorius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Lord Torvos in Shattrath wants you to capture the Sunfury Attack Plans.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lord Torvos in Shattrath.

LogDescription: Take the Orphaned Mammoth Calf to Khu'nok the Behemoth in the Borean Tundra.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Khu'nok the Behemoth in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Kill Kaw the Mammoth Destroyer and recover Kaw's War Halberd. Deliver Kaw's War Halberd to Arch Druid Lathorius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in the Borean Tundra.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Arch Druid Lathorius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Harbinger Haronem in Shattrath City wants you to use the Multiphase Spectrographic Goggles to take 6 Multiphase Readings.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Harbinger Haronem at the Terrace of Light in Shattrath City.

LogDescription: Help Jenny make her way from the crash site to Fezzix Geartwist at Taunka'le Village without losing all her cargo.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Fezzix Geartwist at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Speak to a Master Fire Eater in any Alliance capital.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak to a Master Fire Dancer in any Horde capital.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Killinger the Den Watcher at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in the Borean Tundra wants you to kill Nedar, Lord of Rhinos and his companion, "Lunchbox."
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Killinger the Den Watcher at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Find the Skull Piles in the middle of the summoning circles of Skettis. Summon and defeat each of the descendants by using 10 Time-Lost Scrolls at the Skull Pile.  Return to Hazzik at Blackwind Landing.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hazzik at Blackwind Landing in Terokkar Forest.

LogDescription: Go to the new Twilight Camp south of the Blackfathom Deeps entrance on the Zoram Strand of Ashenvale and retrieve Twilight Correspondence from the cultists, then call upon the Earthen Ring Guide using the Totemic Beacon.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Earthen Ring Guide.

LogDescription: Collect 7 Gnomish Emergency Toolkits from the bodies of crashed Fizzcrank Recon Pilots and bring them to Fezzix Geartwist at Taunka'le Village.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Fezzix Geartwist at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Speak with Sage Earth and Sky at Taunka'le Village.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Sergeant Hammerhill wants you to use the Reinforced Net to help you slay 6 Scourged Flamespitters outside of Valiance Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sergeant Hammerhill at Valiance Keep in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Investigate the area surrounding the Fizzcrank Pumping Station. Then, return to Sage Earth and Sky at Taunka'le Village.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sage Earth and Sky at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Use the Orb of the Crawler to spy upon the new Twilight camp to the west of the Blackfathom Deeps entrance on the Zoram Strand in Ashenvale, then summon the Earthen Ring Guide using the Totemic Beacon.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Earthen Ring Guide.

LogDescription: Arch Druid Lathorius at the D.E.H.T.A. Outpost in the Borean Tundra wants you to kill Harold Lane.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Arch Druid Lathorius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Dorain Frosthoof at Taunka'le Village wants you to use the Windsoul Totem to gather the energy of 10 Steam Ragers.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Dorain Frosthoof at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Fezzix Geartwist at Taunka'le Village wants you to bring him 5 Steam Cured Hides.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Fezzix Geartwist at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Defeat the Storm Tempest and then return to Sage Earth and Sky at Taunka'le Village.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sage Earth and Sky at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: While weakened by the Power of the Storm, destroy any 15 of the robotic units, except the mechagnomes, in the greater pools area surrounding the Fizzcrank Pumping Station.$B$BAfterward, return to Sage Earth and Sky at Taunka'le Village.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sage Earth and Sky at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Sergeant Hammerhill wants you to use the Incendiary Explosives to collapse the sinkholes southwest and northwest of Valiance Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sergeant Hammerhill at Valiance Keep in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Defeat Prince Valanar and his lieutenants, Vanthryn the Merciless and Luthion the Vile, then report to Chieftain Wintergale at Taunka'le Village.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Chieftain Wintergale at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Use The Greatmother's Soulcatcher to capture the souls of 10 Fizzcrank mechagnomes. Then, return to Greatmother Taiga at Taunka'le Village once you have done so.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Greatmother Taiga at Taunka'le Village in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Archmage Berinand at the Transitus Shield has asked you to collect the readings from his instruments in Coldarra.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Archmage Berinand at the Transitus Shield in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Gerald Green in Farshire wants you to go into the mine to the north and find out what happened to the military detachment that was sent there.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Return to Gerald Green in Farshire.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Gerald Green in Farshire wants you to kill 14 Plagued Scavengers.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Gerald Green at Farshire in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Go to the mine in Farshire, obtain the Cart Release Key from Captain Jacobs and use it to release the ore cart.  Return to Gerald Green in Farshire when you've completed this task.

LogDescription: Disguise yourself as an Iron Rune Overseer, intercept the message from Loken, then report to Scout Vor'takh at Camp Oneqwah.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Scout Vor'takh at Camp Oneqwah in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Speak with Hugh Glass and Gavrock about Loken, then report your findings to Scout Vor'takh at Camp Oneqeah.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Scout Vor'takh at Camp Oneqwah in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Kill 20 members of the Scarlet Onslaught and report to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Apothecary Vicky Levine at Venomspite has asked you to test the Flask of Blight upon the Scarlet Onslaught Prisoner.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Apothecary Vicky Levine at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Windseer Grayhorn in Conquest Hold wants you to go to Vordrassil's Limb, Vordrassil's Heart or Vordrassil's Tears and obtain 6 Slime Samples from the Entropic Oozes.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Windseer Grayhorn at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Sergeant Thurkin told you to speak to Samir at Granite Springs.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Quartermaster Bartlett at Venomspite has asked you to steal 8 Scarlet Onslaught Armor and 8 Scarlet Onslaught Weapons.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Quartermaster Bartlett at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Lieutenant Dumont at Amberpine Lodge wants you to speak to Samir at Granite Springs.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Apothecary Vicky Levine at Venomspite has asked you to use her Container of Rats to pick clean the corpses of 15 Scarlet Onslaught members at New Hearthglen.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Apothecary Vicky Levine at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Master Woodsman Anderhol at Amberpine Lodge wants you to kill Tallhorn Stag and collect 8 Succulent Venison.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Master Woodsman Anderhol at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Windseer Grayhorn in Conquest Hold wants you to go to Vordrassil's Heart, Vordrassil's Tears and Vordrassil's Limb and use the Geomancer's Orb in the depths beneath the surface.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Windseer Grayhorn at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Hansel Bauer at Venomspite has asked you to steal 3 Onslaught Warhorses and deliver them to him, handing over the reins when you do so.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hansel Bauer at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Anderhol at Amberpine Lodge wants you to find and kill 6 Graymist Hunters in Grizzly Hills.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Master Woodsman Anderhol at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Anderhol at Amberpine Lodge wants you to collect 8 Grizzly Flanks from the Grizzly Bears in Grizzly Hills.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Master Woodsman Anderhol at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Anderhol in Amberpine Lodge wants you to kill 5 Imperial Eagles and then report back to him.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Master Woodsman Anderhol at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Chief Plaguebringer Middleton at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge wants you to go to Vordrassil's Limb, Vordrassil's Heart or Vordrassil's Tears and obtain 6 Slime Samples from the Entropic Oozes.

LogDescription: Deliver The Forsaken Blight to Doctor Sintar Malefious at Agmar's Hammer.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Doctor Sintar Malefious at Agmar's Hammer in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Bring 3 Flame-Imbued Talismans to Woodsman Drake at Amberpine Lodge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Woodsman Drake at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Kill 12 Dragonflayer Huscarls and return to Woodsman Drake at Amberpine Lodge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Woodsman Drake at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Report to Saurfang the Younger at the Kor'kron Vanguard.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak with Master Woodsman Anderhol in Amberpine Lodge.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Anderhol at Amberpine Lodge wants you to bring him 5 Blackroot Stalks.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Master Woodsman Anderhol at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Anderhol in Amberpine Lodge wants you to take the Anderhol's Slider Cider and use the nearby outhouse to retrieve the Partially Processed Amberseeds.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Master Woodsman Anderhol at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.
\n

LogDescription: Windseer Grayhorn in Conquest Hold wants you to obtain 8 Crazed Furbolg Blood from the Furbolgs at Heart's Blood Shrine and Rage Fang Shrine.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Windseer Grayhorn at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Deathguard Molder at Venomspite has asked you to retrieve 6 Siegesmith Bombs.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Deathguard Molder at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Windseer Grayhorn in Conquest Hold wants you to speak to Orsonn at the Ragefang Shrine and Kodian at the Heart's Blood Shrine.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Windseer Grayhorn at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Deathguard Molder at Venomspite has asked you to use the Siegesmith Bombs to bombard 5 New Hearthglen Ballistae.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Deathguard Molder at Venomspite in Dragonblight.
\n

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Spy Mistress Repine at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogTitle: Naxxramas and the Fall of Wintergarde
LogDescription: Speak with Gryphon Commander Urik at the gryphon station in Wintergarde Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Windseer Grayhorn in Conquest Hold wants you to find Tur Ragepaw near Ursoc's Den and defeat Ursoc with his help.  Use the Purified Ashes of Vordrassil on Ursoc's Corpse when you've accomplished this.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Windseer Grayhorn at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Rescue 10 Helpless Wintergarde Villagers and return to Gryphon Commander Urik at Wintergarde Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Gryphon Commander Urik at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Drakuru wants you to use Drakuru's Elixir at his brazier inside Drak'Tharon. Using Drakuru's Elixir there will require 5 Enduring Mojo.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Deliver the Scarlet Onslaught Daily Orders to Agent Skully at New Hearthglen.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Agent Skully at The Dragon Wastes in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Apothecary Vicky Levine at Venomspite has asked you to use the Levine Family Termites to lure Foreman Kaleiki out and kill him.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Apothecary Vicky Levine at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Windseer Grayhorn in Conquest Hold wants you to take the Verdant Torch and use it to burn Vordrassil's Sapling.  Bring Vordrassil's Ashes back to Windseer Grayhorn.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Windseer Grayhorn at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Windseer Grayhorn in Conquest Hold wants you to go to Grizzlemaw and obtain 8 of Vordrassil's Seeds.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Windseer Grayhorn at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Apothecary Vicky Levine at Venomspite has asked you to use her Apothecary's Burning Water to set the sails of the Sinner's Folly afire.$B$BWhile the deckhands are busy attempting to put the fires out, head belowdecks and retrieve Captain Shely's Rutters from the captain.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Apothecary Vicky Levine at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Synipus at Blue Sky Logging Grounds wants you to bring 3 Broken-down Shredders back to him.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Synipus at Blue Sky Logging Grounds in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Spy Mistress Repine has asked you to slay Deathguard Schneider, Senior Scrivener Barriga, Engineer Burke, and Chancellor Amai.$B$BWhen you've accomplished this task, report your success to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge wants you to obtain 8 Crazed Furbolg Blood from the Furbolgs at Heart's Blood Shrine and Rage Fang Shrine.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge wants you to speak to Orsonn at the Rage Fang Shrine and Kodian at the Heart's Blood Shrine.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Hierophant Thayreen in Amberpine Lodge wants you to take the Verdant Torch and use it to burn Vordrassil's Sapling.  Bring Vordrassil's Ashes back to Hierophant Thayreen.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge wants you to find Tur Ragepaw near Ursoc's Den and defeat Ursoc with his help.  Use the Purified Ashes of Vordrassil on Ursoc's Corpse when you've accomplished this.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge wants you to go to Grizzlemaw and obtain 8 of Vordrassil's Seeds.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Speak with High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: High Executor Wroth at Venomspite wants you to use the branding iron 5 times on Torturer LeCraft to get the information out of him. After that, kill him.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight wants you to rescue 6 Trapped Wintergarde Villagers.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Agent Skully at New Hearthglen has asked you to acquire Bishop Street's Prayer Book.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Agent Skully at New Hearthglen in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Use Flamebringer to defeat Thane Torvald Eriksson and report to Woodsman Drake at Amberpine Lodge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Woodsman Drake at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Bring 3 Flame-Imbued Talismans to Sergeant Nazgrim at Conquest Hold.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sergeant Nazgrim at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Kill 12 Dragonflayer Huscarls and return to Sergeant Nazgrim at Conquest Hold.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sergeant Nazgrim at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Commander Lynore Windstryke at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight wants you to kill 15 Vengeful Geists.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Commander Lynore Windstryke at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Use Flamebringer to defeat Thane Torvald Eriksson and report to Sergeant Nazgrim at Conquest Hold.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sergeant Nazgrim at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Agent Skully at New Hearthglen has asked you steal the image of a Onslaught Raven Priest. Return the Banshee's Magic Mirror to her when you have done so.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Agent Skully at New Hearthglen in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Place a Destructive Ward at the end of the path leading out of Obsidian Dragonshrine, where the road starts to give way to snow. Protect the ward until it is fully charged, then return to Serinar.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Serinar at the Maw of Neltharion in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Kill 6 Burning Depths Necrolytes and 10 Smoldering Skeletons outside of the Obsidian Dragonshrine. Return to Serinar once the task is complete.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Serinar at the Maw of Neltharion in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Wait for Serinar to administer the disguise of a Burning Depths Necrolyte, then proceed to the back of the Maw of Neltharion to uncover what the Cult of the Damned is doing there. Return to Serinar with details regarding their purpose.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Serinar at the Maw of Neltharion in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Kill 3 Burning Depths Necromancers, 6 Smoldering Constructs, and 6 Smoldering Geist in the Maw of Neltharion, and then return to Serinar.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Serinar at Maw of Neltharion in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Locate and stamp out 8 Necromantic Runes that have been drawn on the floor inside the Maw of Neltharion. Return to Serinar once the task is complete.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Serinar at the Maw of Neltharion in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Travel back to Wyrmrest and let Nalice know that Serinar's task is complete.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Use Neltharion's Flame to douse the summoning area in the back of the Maw of Neltharion. Once you get the attention of Rothin the Decaying, kill him, then return to Serinar at the front of the cave.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Serinar at the Maw of Neltharion in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Pipthwack in Blue Sky Logging Grounds wants you to collect 4 Grooved Cogs, 3 Notched Sprockets, and 2 High Tension Springs.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Pipthwack at Blue Sky Logging Grounds in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Highlord Leoric Von Zeldig at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight wants you to recover 10 Wintergarde Miner's Cards.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Highlord Leoric Von Zeldig at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Grekk at Blue Sky Logging Grounds wants you to acquire 3 shredders and return to him with them.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Grekk at Blue Sky Logging Grounds in Grizzy Hills.

LogDescription: Deliver the Torturer's Rod to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Siege Engineer Quarterflash at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight wants you to recover 10 samples of Strange Ore from Wintergarde Mine.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Siege Engineer Quarterflash at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: High Executor Wroth at Venomspite has tasked you with using the Rod of Compulsion on Commander Jordan, Lead Cannoneer Zierhut, Blacksmith Goodman, and Stable Master Mercer.$B$BOnce the rod has been used on them, kill each to exact a denouncement of the Scarlet Onslaught as their final words.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Agent Skully at New Hearthglen has asked you to ring the bell in the abbey and then go speak with the high abbot and get information out of him.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Agent Skully at New Hearthglen in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Speak with Siege Engineer Quarterflash at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Find Slinkin the Demo-gnome in Wintergarde Mine. Use Quarterflash's Homing Bot if you need help finding the mine.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Retrieve a Wintergarde Mine Bomb and use it to blow up the Upper Wintergarde Mine Shaft and the Lower Wintergarde Mine Shaft. Report back to Siege Engineer Quarterflash at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight when you have completed this task.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Siege Engineer Quarterflash at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Bring the "Brew of the Month" club membership form to Larkin Thunderbrew in the Stonefire Tavern in Ironforge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Larkin Thunderbrew in Dun Morogh.

LogDescription: Bring 6 Northern Salmon to Hugh Glass at the Redwood Trading Post.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hugh Glass at Redwood Trading Post in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Lurz at Blue Sky Logging Grounds wants you to collect 4 Grooved Cogs, 3 Notched Sprockets, and 2 High Tension Springs.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lurz at Blue Sky Logging Grounds in Grizzy Hills.

LogDescription: Deliver Quarterflash's Package to High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Zelig the Visionary at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight wants you to recover his Scrying Orb.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Zelig the Visionary at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Agent Skully has asked you to acquire The Diary of High General Abbendis and to deliver it to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Commander Bargok wants you to kill 15 Alliance units or players in Blue Sky Logging Ground.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Commander Bargok at Blue Sky Logging Grounds in Grizzy Hills.

LogDescription: High Executor Wroth at Venomspite has ordered you to return with The Head of the High General.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite in Dragonblight.
\n

LogTitle: Orik Trueheart and the Forgotten Shore
LogDescription: Seek out the assistance of Orik Trueheart at Dawn's Reach in Dragonblight.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Aumana at Blue Sky Logging Grounds wants you to use the Renewing Tourniquet on 10 Wounded Skirmishers.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Aumana at Blue Sky Logging Grounds in Grizzy Hills.

LogDescription: Sergeant Hartsman wants you to defeat 15 Horde units or players in Blue Sky Logging Grounds.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sergeant Hartsman at Blue Sky Logging Grounds in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Orik Trueheart at Dawn's Reach in Dragonblight wants you to recover 5 Murkweed from the Eldritch Heights.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Orik Trueheart at Dawn's Reach in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Orik Trueheart at Dawn's Reach in Dragonblight wants you to hear the tales of a Forgotten Peasant, Forgotten Rifleman, Forgotten Knight and Forgotten Footman.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Orik Trueheart at Dawn's Reach in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Lieutenant Dumont at Amberpine Lodge wants you to go to Evergreen Trading Post and obtain the Cedar Chest.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lieutenant Dumont at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Bring the Cedar Chest to Ivan at Aspen Grove Post.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ivan at Aspen Grove Post in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Return to Lieutenant Dumont in Amberpine Lodge.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak to Envoy Ducal in Silverbrook.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Rheanna at Blue Sky Logging Grounds wants you to use the Renewing Bandage on 10 Wounded Westfall Infantry units.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Rheanna at Blue Sky Logging Grounds in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Captain Adams has asked you to show the Alliance Missive to Greer Orehammer at Westguard Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Greer Orehammer in Howling Fjord.

LogDescription: Deliver the Alliance Missive to High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep in eastern Dragonblight. $B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Sergei at Silverbrook wants you to slay 8 Conquest Hold Marauders.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sergei at Silverbrook in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Find Sergeant Bonesnap northwest of Silverbrook and pass the Test of Mettle.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Captured Trapper at Silverbrook Hills in Grizzly Hills.

LogTitle: The Truth Shall Set Us Free
LogDescription: Orik Trueheart at Dawn's Reach in Dragonblight wants you to use Orik's Crystalline Orb in the ruins located at the Forgotten Shore to redeem the Forgotten.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Orik Trueheart at Dawn's Reach in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Go to the northwestern end of Silverbrook.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Quartermaster Bartlett at Venomspite has asked you to recover 6 Forgotten Treasure.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Quartermaster Bartlett at Venomspite in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Surveyor Hansen, just north of the Forgotten Shore, has asked you to slay 20 Forgotten ghosts.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Surveyor Hansen at The Forgotten Shore in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Return to Zelig the Visionary at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Bring the "Brew of the Month" club membership form to Ray'ma in the Darkbriar Lodge in Orgrimmar's Valley of Spirits.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ray'ma in Orgrimmar.

LogDescription: Katja in Silverbrook wants you to uproot 8 Wolfsbane Roots.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Katja at Silverbrook in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Open the Wooden Cage and help the Freed Alliance Scout escape from Silverbrook.  Report to Lieutenant Dumont when you reach Amberpine Lodge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lieutenant Dumont at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Seek out Cavalier Durkon at the Wintergarde Crypt in Dragonblight.$B
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Lieutenant Dumont wants you to go to Forest's Edge Post and slay Vladek and 7 Silverbrook Hunters.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lieutenant Dumont at Amberpine Lodge in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Cavalier Durkon at Wintergarde Keep wants you to slay Necrolord Amarion.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Cavalier Durkon at Wintergarde Crypt in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Deliver the Flesh-bound Tome to Cavalier Durkon at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Cavalier Durkon at Wintergarde Crypt in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Talk to the Brewfest spy in the Grim Guzzler of Blackrock Depths.$B
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Slay Captain Zorna and report to Baron Freeman at Venture Bay.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Baron Freeman at Venture Bay in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Slay Captain Brightwater and report to General Khazgar at Venture Bay.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to General Khazgar at Venture Bay in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Defeat 10 Horde units or players in Venture Bay and return to Lieutenant Stuart.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lieutenant Stuart at Venture Bay in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Defeat 10 Alliance units or players in Venture Bay and return to Centurion Kaggrum.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Centurion Kaggrum at Venture Bay in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Speak with the Brewfest Spy in the Grim Guzzler of Blackrock Depths.$B
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Take the Flesh-bound Tome to High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Take the Flesh-bound Tome to Inquisitor Hallard at the Wintergarde Keep prison.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Inquisitor Hallard at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Wait for Inquisitor Hallard to finish his Righteous Sermon and return to High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight with the information you uncover.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Use the Smoke Bomb to drive 20 Venture Company Stragglers from their buildings and then report to Sergeant Downey.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sergeant Downey at Venture Bay in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Use the Smoke Bomb to drive 20 Venture Company Stragglers from their buildings and then report to Stone Guard Ragetotem.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Stone Guard Ragetotem at Venture Bay in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Speak with Gryphon Commander Urik to secure a ride to Thorson's Post. Report to Duke August Foehammer when you arrive at Thorson's Post in Dragonblight.$B
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Use an Alliance Steam Tank to destroy 6 Plague Wagons and deliver the 7th Legion Elites to Wintergarde Mausoleum. Speak with Ambo Cash inside the Wintergarde Mausoleum in Dragonblight should you succeed.
QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Ambo Cash at Wintergarde Mausoleum in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Drink the Gossamer Potion near Ruuna's Crystal Ball and witness the Vision from the Past.
QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Ruuna the Blind at Ruuna's Camp in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Ruuna the Blind wants you to obtain 4 handfuls of Gossamer Dust.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ruuna the Blind at Ruuna's Camp in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Speak to Sasha at the White Pine Trading Post.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sasha at White Pine Trading Post in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Look for Anya in the Duskhowl Den near Solstice Village.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Conqueror Krenna in Conquest Hold wants you to slay 8 Silverbrook Hunters and their leader, Vladek, at the Forest's Edge Post.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Conqueror Krenna at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Conqueror Krenna at Conquest Hold wants you to slay 8 Silverbrook Defenders in the Silverbrook Hills.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Conqueror Krenna at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Ride 5 Highland Mustangs back to Squire Percy at the Westfall Brigade Encampment.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Squire Percy at the Westfall Brigade Encampment in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Scare 15 Highland Mustangs and return to Soulok Stormfury at Camp Oneqwah.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Soulok Stormfury at Camp Oneqwah in Grizzly Hills.

LogDescription: Aid Captain Iskandar in holding the canyons by participating in the death of 12 Frigid Ghoul Attackers, 8 Frigid Geist Attackers, and 1 Frigid Abomination Attacker.$B$BReturn to Ceristrasz once you have finished this task.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ceristrasz at the Dragon Wastes in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Enter the Ruby Dragonshrine through one of the northern or southern passes and search for Ruby Acorns.  Use the Ruby Acorns on the fallen red dragons to return their bodies to the earth.  Return to Ceristrasz once the task is complete.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ceristrasz at the Dragon Wastes in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Enter the Ruby Dragonshrine through one of the northern or southern passes, then kill 6 Frigid Necromancers and eliminate the source of the corruption under the shrine. Return to Ceristrasz once the task is complete.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ceristrasz at the Dragon Wastes in Dragonblight.

LogTitle: The Fate of the Ruby Dragonshrine
LogDescription: Bring Dahlia Suntouch's Ruby Brooch to Krasus in the Ruling Council Chamber at Wyrmrest and inform him of Dahlia's fate.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Krasus at Wyrmrest Temple in Dragonblight.

LogDescription: Bring the "Brew of the Month" club membership form to Larkin Thunderbrew in the Stonefire Tavern in Ironforge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Larkin Thunderbrew in Dun Morogh.

LogDescription: Bring the "Brew of the Month" club membership form to Ray'ma in the Darkbriar Lodge in Orgrimmar's Valley of Spirits.

LogDescription: Bring a pure sample of Oracle Blood to the Altar of Kartak to summon Kartak. With the aid of Kartak's shared powers, slaughter 50 of the nearby Sparktouched Gorlocs for Shaman Jakjek in Kartak's Hold.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Shaman Jakjek at Kartak's Hold in Sholazar Basin.

LogDescription: High-Oracle Soo-say in Rainspeaker Canopy wants you to take a companion to dig up and collect 6 Shiny Treasures.$B$BBe sure to speak to High-Oracle Soo-say in Rainspeaker Canopy about securing the aid of one of your previous companions.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to High-Oracle Soo-say at Rainspeaker Canopy in Sholazar Basin.

LogDescription: Obtain a Tainted Crystal from the wolvar near Sparktouched Haven and bring it to the Great Lightning Stone to call Soo-holu. With the aid of Soo-holu's shared powers, kill 50 of the nearby Frenzyheart wolvar, then return to Lightningcaller Soo-met near the Great Lightning Stone.
QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Lightningcaller Soo-met at Sparktouched Haven in Sholazar Basin.

LogTitle: The Power Of Blood, Frost And Unholy
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Report to Scourge Commander Thalanor at the balcony on the first floor of Ebon Hold.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Brijana at Brunnhildar Village wants you to mount Icefang and shoot 7 Frostworgs and 15 Frost Giants in the Valley of Ancient Winters.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Brijana at the Valley of Ancient Winters in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Lord-Commander Arete wants you to deal with Grand Admiral Westwind. Return to the lord-commander upon Death's Rise after you have done so.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lord-Commander Arete at Death's Rise in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Speak to Jeer Sparksocket at K3 in the Storm Peaks.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Retrieve the Burlap-Wrapped Note from Brann's camp and return it to Archaeologist Andorin at Frosthold.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Archaeologist Andorin at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Use the Frosthound Collar at the Abandoned Camp to track down whoever took Brann's possessions. When you recover them, use the communication device and speak to whoever you can contact.
QuestCompletionLog: Use the communication device and speak to whomever you can contact.

LogDescription: Brijana, just east of Brunnhildar Village, wants you to fly to Dun Niffelem, then free 3 Captured Proto-Drakes and rescue 9 Brunnhildar Prisoners.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Brijana in the Valley of Ancient Winters in the Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Recover Ragemane's Flipper and return it to Chief Rageclaw at Light's Breach in Zul'Drak.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Chief Rageclaw at Light's Breach in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Gather 6 Inventor's Disk Fragments and use them to assemble the Inventor's Disk.
QuestCompletionLog: Use Brann's Communicator to contact Brann Bronzebeard.$B$BIf you lose Brann's Communicator, speak to Archaeologist Andorin at Frosthold to replace it.

LogTitle: This Just In: Fire Still Hot!
LogDescription: Elder Shaman Moky at Light's Breach in Zul'Drak wants you to use the Rageclaw Fire Extinguisher to douse 15 hut fires at Rageclaw Den.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Elder Shaman Moky at Light's Breach in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Use the Inventor's Disk to retrieve 7 pieces of Hidden Data from the Databanks.
QuestCompletionLog: Use Brann's Communicator to contact Brann Bronzebeard.$B$BIf you lose Brann's Communicator, speak to Archaeologist Andorin at Frosthold to replace it.

LogDescription: Chief Rageclaw at Light's Breach in Zul'Drak wants you to use the Drakuru "Lock Openers" found on various Drakuru trolls to free 8 Captured Rageclaw.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Chief Rageclaw at Light's Breach in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Speak to Ricket to make use of Ricket's D16 Propelled Delivery Device to enter further into Storm Peaks.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Bring the crate of medical supplies to Glorthal Stiffbeard in Frosthold.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Glorthal Stiffbeard at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Glorthal in Frosthold has requested a search of the Bor's Breath valley and Bor's Fall for any sign of the missing Frostborn Scouts.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Glorthal Stiffbeard at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Fjorlin Frostbrow at Frosthold wants you to obtain 8 slabs of Fresh Ice Rhino Meat and use them to feed the Stormcrest Eagles above town.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Fjorlin Frostbrow at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Glorthal Stiffbeard at Frosthold wants you to kill 8 Frostfeather Screechers and 8 Frostfeather Witches.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Glorthal Stiffbeard at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Fjorlin Frostbrow at Frosthold would like you to bring back 15 Stormcrest Eagle Eggs.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Fjorlin Frostbrow at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Glorthal Stiffbeard at Frosthold wants you to kill Sirana Iceshriek.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Glorthal Stiffbeard at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Fjorlin Frostbrow at Frosthold wants you to ride with a Stormcrest Eagle and kill 16 Stormpeak Wyrms in the Foot Steppes.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Fjorlin Frostbrow at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Return 10 Relics of Ulduar to Rork Sharpchin in Frosthold.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Rork Sharpchin at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Take Norgannon's Shell to Lagnus at Frosthold.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lagnus at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Recover Norgannon's Shell from Archivist Mechaton.
QuestCompletionLog: Use Brann's Communicator to contact Brann Bronzebeard.$B$BIf you lose Brann's Communicator, speak to Archaeologist Andorin at Frosthold to replace it.

LogDescription: Speak to Yorg Stormheart in Frosthold.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Yorg Stormheart at Frosthold has requested that you speak to Fjorlin Frostbrow to secure a ride and face your challenge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Yorg Stormheart at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Locate Drom Frostgrip.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Fjorlin Frostbrow at Frosthold wants you to kill 10 Stormforged Invaders.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Fjorlin Frostbrow at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Recover Frostgrip's Signet Ring from an Iron Dwarf Monitor and then bring it to Creteus in the Foot Steppes.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Creteus at The Foot Steppes in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Creteus in the Foot Steppes has provided you with the information to locate Norgannon's Core.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Bring Norgannon's Core back to Creteus in the Foot Steppes.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Creteus at The Foot Steppes in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Bring Norgannon's Core to Brann Bronzebeard in the Engine of the Makers.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Brann Bronzebeard at the Engine of the Makers in The Storm Peaks.
\n

LogDescription: Return 10 Relics of Ulduar to Olut Alegut at the Grom'arsh Crash-site.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Olut Alegut at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Return the Orders From Drakuru to Crusader Lord Lantinga at Light's Breach in Zul'Drak.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Crusader Lord Lantinga at Light's Breach in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Deliver the Orders From Drakuru to Stefan Vadu at Ebon Watch in Zul'Drak.
QuestCompletionLog: Report to Stefan Vadu at Ebon Watch in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Speak with Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Use the Hyldnir Harpoon to defeat 10 Hyldsmeet Drakeriders at the Temple of Storms.  Use the Hyldnir Harpoon on a Column Ornament to exit the Drakkensryd and speak to Thorim when you've succeeded.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thorim at the Temple of Storms in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Destroy The Ocular and then report to Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Bring the SCRAP-E Access Card along with 4 Handfuls of Cobalt Bolts and 5 Overcharged Capacitors to SCRAP-E at The Inventor's Library.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to SCRAP-E at the Inventor's Library in the Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Interact with the Prototype Console in The Inventor's Library.
QuestCompletionLog: \n
\n

LogTitle: I Have an Idea, But First...
LogDescription: Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault has asked you to collect a Cultist Rod, an Abomination Hook, a Geist Rope, and 5 Scourge Essences.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Destroy The Ocular and then report to Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Baron Sliver at the Shadow Vault wants you to use the Sovereign Rod on the corpses of Vile, Lady Nightswood, and The Leaper.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Seek out Crusader MacKellar at the Crusader Forward Camp in Zul'Drak.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Retrieve the Burlap-Wrapped Note from Brann's camp and return it to Boktar Bloodfury at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Boktar Bloodfury at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Defeat General Lightsbane and then report your success back to Thassarian aboard the gunship, The Skybreaker.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thassarian at the Skybreaker in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Defeat General Lightsbane and then report your success back to Koltira Deathweaver aboard the gunship, Orgrim's Hammer.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Koltira Deathweaver at Orgrim's Hammer in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Report back to Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Report back to Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Astrid Bjornrittar in Brunnhildar Village wants you to obtain 3 Icemane Yeti Hides.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Astrid Bjornrittar at Brunnhildar Village in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Engineer Reed at Crusader Forward Camp in Zul'Drak has asked that you recover 10 pieces of Scourge Scrap Metal.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Engineer Reed at Crusader Forward Camp in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Search Rageclaw Den for a clue about who or what initiated the attacks against the Rageclaw Wolvar.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Crusader MacKellar at Crusader Forward Camp has asked that you find Crusader Dargath, Gerk and Burr.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Crusader MacKellar at Crusader Forward Camp in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Gerk at Thrym's End in Zul'Drak wants you to kill 15 Vargul.$B
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Gerk at Thrym's End in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Speak to Mildred the Cruel inside the Forlorn Mine.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Mildred the Cruel at the Forlorn Mine wants you to use the Disciplining Rod on 6 Exhausted Vrykul.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mildred the Cruel at The Forlorn Mine in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Mildred the Cruel at the Forlorn Mine wants you to slay Garhal.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mildred the Cruel at The Forlorn Mine in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Take Mildred's Key to Lok'lira the Crone in the Forlorn Mine.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lok'lira the Crone at Snowblind Terrace in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Speak with Khaliisi at the foot of the mountain east of the Grom'arsh Crash-Site.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Mount Frostbite and ride her to the source of the scent from Brann's note. Then, recover Brann's Communicator and use it to make contact with Brann Bronzebeard.
QuestCompletionLog: Use Brann's Communicator to speak with Brann Bronzebeard.

LogDescription: /wave at Kill Credit Test
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Kill Credit Test.

LogDescription: Gymer, King of Storm Giants, has asked you to find a way to release him from his cage. Speak with Engineer Reed at the Crusader Forward Camp.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak with Moteha Windborn at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Engineer Reed at Crusader Forward Camp in Zul'Drak wants you to bring him 6 Banshee Essence and 6 Diatomaceous Earth.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Engineer Reed at Crusader Forward Camp in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Thorim at the Temple of Storms wants you to Kill Fjorn and 5 Stormforged Iron Giants at Fjorn's Anvil, east of Dun Niffelem.$b$bUsing Thorim's Charm of Earth will summon his Earthen to fight by your side. The charm requires a Granite Boulder from nearby Fjorn's Anvil.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thorim at the Temple of Storms in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Speak to Gymer at Thrym's End in Zul'Drak once you have used the Jumbo Seaforium Charge to open the Scourge Enclosure that is holding him prisoner.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Gymer at Thrym's End in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Bring 5 Voices of the Wind to Moteha Windborn at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Moteha Windborn at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Return two Huge Citrines, two Dark Jade and two Shadow Crystals to Ounhulo in Valgarde.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ounhulo at Valgarde in Howling Fjord.

LogDescription: Speak with Gymer to begin.$B$BWhile riding Gymer, destroy 100 Scourge and kill Algar the Chosen, Thrym and Prince Navarius. Report to Crusader MacKellar at Crusader Forward Camp should you succeed.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Crusader MacKellar at Crusader Forward Camp in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Use Brann's Communicator to contact Brann Bronzebeard and speak with him, then speak to Boktar Bloodfury at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site.$B$BIf you lose Brann's Communicator, speak with Moteha Windborn at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Boktar Bloodfury at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Reconvene with Lok'lira the Crone in Brunnhildar Village.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: You must collect 10 Furious Sparks from the Seething Revenants at Frostfield Lake and then use the anvil at Fjorn's Anvil.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Fjorn's Anvil at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: You are to go to Dun Niffelem and ask King Jokkum to allow Thorim's armor to be reforged. After completing Jokkum's task, you are to speak with Njormeld in Dun Niffelem.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Njormeld at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Thyra Kvinnshal in Brunnhildar Village wants you to go to Valkyrion and obtain Vials of Frost Oil from the Valkyrion Aspirants.  Use the Vials of Frost Oil to destroy 30 Plagued Proto-Drake Eggs.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thyra Kvinnshal at Brunnhildar Village in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Use Brann's Communicator to contact Brann Bronzebeard and find out what to do next.
QuestCompletionLog: Use Brann's Communicator to contact Brann Bronzebeard.$B$BIf you lose Brann's Communicator, speak to Moteha Windborn at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site to replace it.

LogDescription: Use the Inventor's Disk to retrieve 7 pieces of Hidden Data from the Databanks.
QuestCompletionLog: Use Brann's Communicator to contact Brann Bronzebeard.$B$BIf you lose Brann's Communicator, speak to Morteha Windborn at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site to replace it.

LogDescription: Recover Norgannon's Shell from Archivist Mechaton.
QuestCompletionLog: Use Brann's Communicator to contact Brann Bronzebeard.$B$BIf you lose Brann's Communicator, speak to Morteha Windborn at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site to replace it.

LogDescription: Speak with Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Use the Earthen Mining Pick to mine 7 clumps of Enchanted Earth. Bring the earth and 5 Frostweave Cloth to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Bouldercrag the Rockshaper wants you to slay 10 Stormforged Attackers and return to him at Bouldercrag's Refuge. You may kill either Stormforged Raiders or Stormforged Reavers.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Get in the arena at the Amphitheater of Anguish and defeat Yggdras! Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant to redeem your reward.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at Amphitheater of Anguish in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Get in the arena at the Amphitheater of Anguish and defeat Stinkbeard! Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant to redeem your reward.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at Amphitheater of Anguish in Zul'Drak.

LogTitle: The Amphitheater of Anguish: From Beyond!
LogDescription: Get in the arena at the Amphitheater of Anguish and defeat one of the elemental lords! Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant to redeem your reward.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at Amphitheater of Anguish in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Get in the arena at the Amphitheater of Anguish and defeat Orinoko Tuskbreaker! Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant to redeem your reward.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at Amphitheater of Anguish in Zul'Drak.

LogTitle: The Amphitheater of Anguish: Korrak the Bloodrager!
LogDescription: Get in the arena at the Amphitheater of Anguish and defeat Korrak the Bloodrager! Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant to redeem your reward.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at Amphitheater of Anguish in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Use the Telluric Poultice to heal 8 Fallen Earthen Defenders, then return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Speak with Duke Lankral at The Shadow Vault.

LogDescription: Duke Lankral at The Shadow Vault has asked you to use the Challenge Flag to challenge and defeat 6 Mjordin Combatants.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Duke Lankral at The Shadow Vault in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Iva the Vengeful in Brunnhildar Village wants you to go to Valkyrion and slay 12 Nascent Val'kyr.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Iva the Vengeful at Brunnhildar Village in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Duke Lankral at The Shadow Vault has ordered you to read the Shadow Vault Decree in the presence of Thane Ufrang the Mighty, and then to slay him.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Duke Lankral at The Shadow Vault in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Get in the arena at the Amphitheater of Anguish and defeat Vladof the Butcher! Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant to redeem your reward.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at Amphitheater of Anguish in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: Vaelen the Flayed at Ufrang's Hall has asked you to retrieve the Key to Vaelen's Chains.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vaelen the Flayed at The Shadow Vault in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Return two Huge Citrines, two Dark Jade and two Shadow Crystals to Carter Tiffens in Vengeance Landing.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Carter Tiffens at Vengeance Landing in Howling Fjord.

LogDescription: Use the Valkyrion Harpoon Guns to burn 6 Dry Haystacks.
