LogDescription: Get in the arena at the Amphitheater of Anguish and defeat Yggdras! Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant to redeem your reward.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at Amphitheater of Anguish in Zul'Drak.

LogDescription: The Leaper at The Shadow Vault wants you to duel and defeat Sigrid Iceborn, Efrem the Faithful, Onu'zun and Tinky Wickwhistle.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to The Leaper at The Shadow Vault in Icecrown.

LogDescription: You are to bring the Refined Gleaming Ore to Thorim in the Temple of Storms.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thorim at the Temple of Storms in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge wants you to free 6 Captive Mechagnomes and kill 3 Stormforged Taskmasters.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Combine a Vrykul Amulet, a Dark Jade and a Bloodstone to make a Blood Jade Amulet and bring it to Timothy Jones in Dalaran.$B$BYou can find a Vrykul Amulet on any Northrend Vrykul.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Timothy Jones at Cartier & Co. Fine Jewelry in Dalaran.

LogDescription: Combine Northern Ivory, a Chalcedony and a Shadow Crystal to create a Glowing Ivory Figurine and bring it to Timothy Jones in Dalaran.$B$BYou can find a Northern Ivory on any Shoveltusk or Mammoth in Northrend.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Timothy Jones at Cartier & Co. Fine Jewelry in Dalaran.

LogDescription: Combine an Iron Dwarf Brooch, a Huge Citrine and a Sun Crystal to create a Wicked Sun Brooch and bring it to Timothy Jones in Dalaran.$B$BYou can find an Iron Dwarf Brooch on any Northrend Iron Dwarf.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Timothy Jones at Cartier & Co. Fine Jewelry in Dalaran.

LogDescription: Combine a Proto Dragon Bone, a Sun Crystal and a Dark Jade to craft an Intricate Bone Figurine and bring it to Timothy Jones in Dalaran.$B$BYou can find a Proto Dragon Bone on any Northrend Proto Dragon.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Timothy Jones at Cartier & Co. Fine Jewelry in Dalaran.

LogDescription: Combine an Elemental Armor Scrap, a Bloodstone and a Huge Citrine to craft a Bright Armor Relic and bring it to Timothy Jones in Dalaran.$B$BYou can find an Elemental Armor Scrap on any Northrend Revenant.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Timothy Jones at Cartier & Co. Fine Jewelry in Dalaran.

LogDescription: Combine a Scourge Curio, a Sun Crystal and a Shadow Crystal to make a Shifting Sun Curio and bring it to Timothy Jones in Dalaran.$B$BYou can find a Scourge Curio on any Northrend Scourge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Timothy Jones at Cartier & Co. Fine Jewelry in Dalaran.

LogDescription: Bring 5 Ore Samples to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Destroy Loken's Fury, Loken's Power, and Loken's Favor, and return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: King Jokkum in Dun Niffelem wants you to find Njormeld at Fjorn's Anvil.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Njormeld wants you to accompany Snorri to Fjorn's anvil and help him kill 10 Seething Revenants.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Njormeld at Fjorn's Anvil in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Iva the Vengeful at Brunnhildar Village wants you to slay Yulda the Stormspeaker in Valkyrion.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Iva the Vengeful at Brunnhildar Village in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Challenge Agnetta Tyrsdottar in order to save Zeev Fizzlespark.  Return to Lok'lira the Crone in Brunnhildar Village after you've succeeded.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lok'lira the Crone at Brunnhildar Village in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Listen to Lok'lira the Crone's proposal.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lok'lira the Crone at Brunnhildar Village in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Lok'lira the Crone in Brunnhildar Village wants you to defeat 6 Victorious Challengers.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lok'lira the Crone at Brunnhildar Village in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Speak to Brijana outside Brunnhildar Village.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Accompany Brann Bronzebeard and his flying machine to Frosthold.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Velog Icebellow at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Seek out Gurgthock at the Amphitheater of Anguish in Zul'Drak.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: King Jokkum in Dun Niffelem wants you to collect 8 Horn Fragments from Thunderfall.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to King Jokkum at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: King Jokkum wants you to bring Hodir's Horn Fragments to Njormeld in Dun Niffelem.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Njormeld at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: You are to defeat 5 Niffelem Forefathers and 5 Restless Frostborn at Thunderfall. You are then to blow Hodir's Horn over their corpses, then return to Hodir's Horn in Dun Niffelem.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to King Jokkum at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Bruor Ironbane at Bouldercrag's Refuge wants you to kill 10 Nidavelir Stormforged. You may kill Stormforged Champions, Stormforged Magi, or Stormforged War Golems.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bruor Ironbane at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Bring 4 Dark Armor Samples to Bruor Ironbane at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: Report to Bruor Ironbane at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Take the Dark Armor Plate to Mimir's Workshop and ask Attendant Tock to examine it. When you're finished, return to Bruor Ironbane at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bruor Ironbane at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: You are to go to Frostfield Lake, kill the Brittle Revenants there and use the Essence of Ice on the Smoldering Scraps at Fjorn's Anvil. You are then to collect 6 of the Frozen Iron scraps and return to Fjorn's Anvil in Dun Niffelem.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Fjorn's Anvil at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Vaelen the Flayed at The Shadow Vault wants you to free 8 Ebon Blade Prisoners. They can be found in the cages throughout the greater Jotunheim region.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vaelen the Flayed at the Shadow Vault in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Astrid Bjornrittar in Brunnhildar Village wants you to rescue an Icemaw Matriarch in the Hibernal Cavern.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Astrid Bjornrittar at Brunnhildar Village in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Use Bouldercrag's War Horn when you have found Valduran the Stormborn. Defeat Valduran the Stormborn and return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Njormeld in Dun Niffelem needs you to use the Diamond Tipped Pick on the Dead Iron Giants at Frostfield Lake and return to him when you have collected 8 Stormforged Eyes.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Njormeld at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Creteus in the Foot Steppes has requested that you travel to the Temple of Invention, the Temple of Winter, the Temple of Life, and the Temple of Order and utilize the databank to examine each area.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Creteus at The Foot Steppes in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Njormeld wants you to fly to the tip of the northern ice spike in Dun Niffelem and use the Tablets of Pronouncement.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Njormeld at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Destroy the North Lightning Forge, the Central Lightning Forge, and the South Lightning Forge with Bouldercrag's Bombs, then return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Astrid Bjornrittar wants you to slay 8 Ravenous Jormungar in the Hibernal Cavern east of Brunnhildar Village.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Astrid Bjornrittar at Brunnhildar Village in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Bring Jon LeCraft the materials he seeks to avoid a swift death, and to get a cool new spell.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Jonathan LeCraft in Designer Island.

LogDescription: Kill 10 Stormforged Artificers and return to Bruor Ironbane at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bruor Ironbane at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Vile at The Shadow Vault wants you to slay any 15 vrykul in the greater Jotunheim region.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vile at The Shadow Vault in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Retrieve the Colossus Attack Specs and Colossus Defense Specs and bring them to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: You must defeat 3 Stormforged Spies in the Valley of Ancient Winters.$b$bUsing the Ethereal Worg's Fang at the Corpse of the Fallen Worg will summon an Ethereal Frostworg, which will expose hidden enemies. You are to return to the Frostworg Denmother in Dun Niffelem when the valley has been cleansed of spies.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Frostworg Denmother at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault wishes you to plant 15 Ebon Blade Banners near the corpses of vrykul found within the greater Jotunheim region.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Speak with The Bone Witch within the cave at Njorndar Village.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Bloodguard Lorga wants you to go to the Gimorak's Den to the east and obtain 6 Worg Furs.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bloodguard Lorga at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Lorekeeper Randvir in Dun Niffelem wants you to collect 3 Everfrost Shards from the depths of Hibernal Cavern and 3 Stoic Mammoth Hides from the Stoic Mammoths in the Valley of Ancient Winters.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lorekeeper Randvir at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Return two Huge Citrines, two Dark Jade and two Shadow Crystals to Geba'li in Warsong Hold.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Geba'li at Warsong Hold in Borean Tundra.

LogDescription: Return two Huge Citrines, two Dark Jade and two Shadow Crystals to Alestros in Valiance Keep.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Alestos at Valiance Keep in Borean Tundra.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thorim at Terrace of the Makers in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: You are to enter Hibernal Cavern west of Dun Niffelem and collect 5 units of Viscous Oil from the Viscous Oils there.$b$bYou are then to return to Dun Niffelem and apply the oil to Hodir's Helm.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hodir's Helm at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Use a Tamed Jormungar to defeat the Iron Colossus and return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Crusade Commander Entari at the Argent Vanguard in Icecrown has asked that you free 8 Webbed Crusaders.

LogDescription: Njormeld wants you to take the Reforged Armor to Thorim at the Temple of Storms.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thorim at the Temple of Storms in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Thorim wants you to talk to King Jokkum in Dun Niffelem and discover what he knows of Krolmir.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thorim at the Temple of Storms in the Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: King Jokkum in Dun Niffelem wants you to slay Jormuttar in Hibernal Cavern.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to King Jokkum at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thorim at Terrace of the Makers in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Report to Crusade Commander Entari at the Argent Vanguard in Icecrown.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Speak with Chieftain Swiftspear in Frostfloe Deep, then return to Xarantaur at Camp Tunka'lo.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Xarantaur at Camp Tunka'lo in The Storm Peaks.

LogTitle: Deep in the Bowels of The Underhalls
LogDescription: The Bone Witch in Njorndar Village has asked you to beat information out of Apprentice Osterkilgr concerning what Dr. Terrible is truly up to.$B$BYou are then to slay the apprentice.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to The Bone Witch at Njorndar Village in Icecrown.

LogTitle: The Sum is Greater than the Parts
LogDescription: Mount and take control of Nergeld. Defend it from the denizens of the Hall of Horrors until Dr. Terrible shows himself.$B$BUse Nergeld to slay the doctor, and then return to The Bone Witch in Njorndar Village.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to The Bone Witch at Njorndar Village in Icecrown.

LogDescription: Speak with Penumbrius at the Argent Vanguard in Icecrown.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Rescue 3 Captured Argent Crusaders from Scourgeholme and drop them off at the Vanguard Infirmary at the center of the Argent Vanguard. Report to Highlord Tirion Fordring should you succeed.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Highlord Tirion Fordring at the Argent Vanguard in Icecrown.

LogDescription: You are to feed Arngrim 5 Disembodied Jormungar, then return to Arngrim's frozen image in Dun Niffelem.$b$bYou must go to the Valley of Ancient Winters and use Arngrim's Tooth on the Roaming Jormungar there. Once they have become disembodied, you must fight them until they are weakened.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Arngrim the Insatiable at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Meet Thorim near the Temple of Wisdom.  Report the outcome of the fight to King Jokkum in Dun Niffelem.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to King Jokkum at Dun Niffelem in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Use the Lorehammer on Taunka Relics to attune it to the time of Stormhoof. Once it has been attuned to 6 relics from the time of Stormhoof, return to Xarantaur at Camp Tunka'lo.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Xarantaur at Camp Tunka'lo in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Recover Stormhoof's Spear and Stormhoof's Mail and return them to Xarantaur at Camp Tunka'lo.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Xarantaur at Camp Tunka'lo in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Thorim, at the Temple of Storms, wants you to obtain 5 Small Proto-Drake Eggs from the peaks near Brunnhildar Village.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thorim at the Temple of Storms in Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Place the Stolen Proto-Dragon Eggs on top of the Broodmother's Nest and return to Thorim at the Temple of Storms.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thorim at the Temple of Storms in Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Professor Calvert wants you to take the flight to Lakeside Landing and speak with Pilot Vic there.

LogDescription: Help Zak Wobblesprocket complete the Test Flight.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to "Honest" Max at Bor's Fall in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Look for Tracker Val'zij inside Gimorak's Den, southeast of the Grom'arsh Crash Site.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tracker Val'zij at Gimorak's Den in the Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Tracker Val'zij wants you to slay Gimorak inside Gimorak's Den.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tracker Val'zij at Gimorak's Den in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Find Thorim at the southeastern edge of the Terrace of the Makers, just northwest of Dun Niffelem.
QuestCompletionLog: \n

LogDescription: Use the Lorehammer to travel back in time and face the North Wind as Stormhoof. When Stormhoof falls and drops the Horn of Elemental Fury, use it to finish off the North Wind, and then return to Xarantaur at Camp Tunka'lo.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Xarantaur at Camp Tunka'lo in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Bethod Feigr in The Underhalls wants you to throw down his sword to challenge Thane Illskar and then kill him in The Circle of Suffering.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bethod Feigr at the Underhalls in Icecrown.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Thorim at the Temple of Storms in The Storm Peaks.

LogDescription: Highlord Tirion Fordring at Crusaders' Pinnacle has requested that you locate the hero, Crusader Bridenbrad at the Silent Vigil, in northeast Icecrown.  His fire pit will likely be the most obvious indication of his location from the air.

LogDescription: The Bone Witch in Njorndar Village wants you to possess a Water Terror and use it to slay 10 vrykul in the greater Jotunheim region.$B$BQualifying vrykul are Jotunheim Sleep-Watchers, Jotunheim Warriors, Mjordin Water Magi, Njorndar Spear-Sisters, and Valhalas Vargul.

LogDescription: Investigate a Summoning Altar in the eastern part of the Fleshwerks, then report back to Darkrider Arly at Blackwatch.

LogDescription: The Ebon Watcher at the Valley of Echoes in Icecrown wants you to kill 3 Forgotten Depths High Priests, 3 Forgotten Depths Underkings, and 8 Reanimated Crusaders.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Darkrider Arly at Blackwatch in Icecrown.

QuestCompletionLog: Return to Darkrider Arly at Blackwatch in Icecrown.

LogDescription: The Bone Witch in Njorndar Village has tasked you with using the Eye of the Lich King to gain information.

LogDescription: The Ebon Watcher at the Valley of Echoes in Icecrown wants you to bring him 15 Scourgestones.

LogDescription: The Bone Witch in Njorndar Village wants you to defeat Iskalder upon Battlescar Spire.

LogDescription: The Bone Witch at Njorndar Village has asked you to exact her revenge by challenging and defeating Overthane Balargarde.

LogDescription: Use the Gnomish Playback Device in front of Ozzie Togglevolt north of Kharanos,Milli Featherwhistle at Steelgrill Depot and Tog Rustsprocket outside the Kharanos Inn.  Return to Toby Ziegear when all the speeches have been given.

LogDescription: Test out the ejection system in the Ejector Mechano-Tank.

LogDescription: Ride 'Thunderflash' from Steelgrill Depot to High Tinker Mekkatorque and deliver Toby's speech.
QuestCompletionLog: Give Mekkatorque's Speech to High Tinker Mekkatorque.

LogDescription: Speak to a Doomsayer Orgrimmar's Drag to join the cult,then put on your Recruit's Robe.
QuestCompletionLog: Report to Overseer Jintak at the Jaggedswine Farm outside Orgrimmar.

LogDescription: Test the the Scuttling Mechano-Tank's maneuverability.
QuestCompletionLog: Inform Captain Tread Sparknozzle of your results.

LogDescription: Speak to Doomsayer Stormwind's Old Town to join the doomsday cult,then equip the Doomsday Recruit's Robe you receive.
QuestCompletionLog: Report to Overseer Sylandra at the Mirror Lake Orchard in Elwynn Forest.

LogDescription: While wearing your Cult Disguise,speak to Cultist Kagarn,Cultish Agtar,Cultist Tokka,and Cultist Rokaga at the Jaggedswine Farm in Durotar.
QuestCompletionLog: Report back to Blood Guard Torek in Orgrimmar.

LogDescription: Test out the Shooting Mechano-Tank weapon systems on the nearby targets.
QuestCompletionLog: Inform Captain Tread Sparknozzle of your results.

LogDescription: [ph] Log Description
Learn more about the cult's plans at the altar in the eastern part of the Jaggedswine Farm.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Overseer Jintak at the Jaggedswine Farm.

LogDescription: Take the Elemental Devices to Blood Guard Torek in Orgrimmar's Valley of Strength.
QuestCompletionLog: Take the Elemental Devices to Blood Guard Torek in Orgrimmar's Valley of Strength.

LogDescription: Break Elemental Devices to release their elementals. You must defeat 5 Raging Fire Elementals.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Blood Guard Torek in Orgrimmar's Valley of Strength.

LogDescription: Speak with Thrall at Grommash Hold in Orgrimmar's Valley of Wisdom.
While wearing your Doomsday Message,visit the East Zeppelin Tower,the West Zeppelin Tower,and the town square of Razor Hill.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Overseer Jintak at the Jaggedswine Farm.

LogDescription: Help King Mekkatorque with the assault on Gnomeregan.

QuestCompletionLog: Report back to Captain Anton in Stormwind's Trade District.

LogDescription: While wearing your Doomsday Message,visit the Westbrook Garrison,the Valley of Heroes in Stormwind,and the town square of Goldshire.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Overseer Sylandra at Mirror Lake Orchard.

LogDescription: Learn more about the cult's plans at the altar in the northern part of Mirror Lake Orchard.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Overseer Sylandra at Mirror Lake Orchard.

LogDescription: Take the Elemental Devices to Captain Anton in Stormwind's Trade District.

LogDescription: Destroy Elemental Devices to release their captive elementals. Defeat 5 Raging Wind Elementals.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Captain Anton in Stormwind's Trade District.

LogDescription: Speak with King Varian Wrynn in Stormwind Keep.
Capture 5 Sen'jin Frogs and attune them to Vanira's sight at her Sentry Totem.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vanira at the Darkspear Strand.

LogDescription: Help Vol'jin take back the Echo Isles and kill Zalazane.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vol'jin outside Sen'jin Village.

LogDescription: While riding a bat,use the Sack o' Frogs to place 12 attuned frogs on the markers in the Echo Isles.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vanira in Sen'jin Village.

LogDescription: Use Vol'jin's War Drums to recruit 5 Troll Citizens in Razor Hill.$B$BYou can speak to Handler Marnlek for a bat ride to Razor Hill.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Champion Uru'zin at Sen'jin Village.

LogDescription: While imbued with the Spirit of the Tiger,lure the Tiger Matriarch out of hiding and use your new abilities to best it in combat.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vol'jin at Sen'jin Village.

LogDescription: Talk to Witch Doctor Hez'tok near the circle of ritual dancers outside Sen'jin Village when you're ready to consult the omens.
QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vol'jin near Sen'jin Village.

LogDescription: Speak to Handler Marnlek for a flight to the staging area. Meet Vol'jin on the island east of the war camp.
Give the speech to Captain Tread Sparknozzle at Steelgrill Depot.
QuestCompletionLog: Give the Speech to High Tinker Mekkatorque.
